name: Monster Racing League: Ignition Premium Pass
description: Ignition Season Pass!Get the Premium Pass and unleash an additional 80 unlockable items in Monster Racing League's Race Pass. Stand out with premium cosmetics and unlock powerful monsters faster!

name: Monster Racing League: Shogun Cosmetics Pack
description: Customise your monsters with this pack of nine feudal Japan themed premium cosmetic items. Show off your monster bling!

name: Monster Racing League: Mythology Cosmetics Pack
description: Customise your monsters with this pack of eight mythology-themed premium cosmetic items. Show off your monster bling!

name: Monster Racing League: Medieval Cosmetics Pack
description: Customise your monsters with this pack of eight medieval-themed premium cosmetic items. Show off your monster bling!

name: Angel Legion: Seductive Maid - Red
description: Embark on your adventure with player from all over the world! Lead your Angel team to reveal the ancient mysteries of Galaxy…… Welcome to Angel legion, a free RPG gacha game with good fun!

name: Cones in Space
description: Cones in Space: Literally the best survival game you will ever play.

name: Fernbus Simulator: Denmark
description: The danish are considered to be the happiest people in the world. They have their own word for cosiness and that is hyggelig. Perhaps it is the gentle and beautiful landscape that makes the danish people happy. Owners of the Fernbus coach simulator can now find out with the add-on Denmark.

name: Temtem: Showdown
description: Jump right into Temtem competitive action in this free multiplayer battle simulator! Build your team in seconds and dash into ranked matches with players from all over the world for pure, no-frills Temtem battling action—no leveling or taming required!

name: Road Bustle 2
description: "Road Bustle 2" is a lively casual game that immerses you in a world filled with bustling traffic and endless adventures. The challenge lies in delivering packages across busy roads teeming with vehicles and even trains. As the player, you can choose transport to aid your journey, each lending a unique twist to the gameplay. The game is designed with vibrant, eye-catching graphics that add a dash of charm to the chaos of the roads. It's not just about survival; the speed of traffic increases over time, pushing your agility to the limit. Along the way, collect food to boost your speed and score points, adding a layer of fun and strategy.

name: Be King
description: Be king is a decision taking game, and you can loose if you take the wrong decisions! Taking and making the right decisions is what you need to ensure you keep increasing your empire in size, and in power!

name: BloodDome Classic
description: The Bullet Heaven arcade classic that started it all! Create unique builds, kill ever-growing hordes of contestants and beat your friends' high scores in the retro-futuristic gladiator arena BloodDome.

name: Starship Traders MMO
description: A sci-fi sandbox MMO where players explore galaxies, hunt aliens, and form corporations to combine forces for larger opportunities.

name: Dust and Aliens
description: Play a space cowboy as he travels to an alien-filled arena, traversing the various game rooms to achieve the highest possible score and challenge the ultimate Dust and Aliens enemy!

name: Aohri's Uprising
description: Embark on an adventure, driven by vengeance, to hunt down your former god and put an end to his reign to restore balance to the world!

name: DotDot
description: Subject "AISister" is attempting to solve some puzzles. Understanding the concept between dots (octagonal prism) and lines is crucial to complete those intricately designed levels. You can interact with the surrounding environment and objects to discover clues about the story behind.

name: Time Knight vs. Zombies
description: Help the knight close the time corridors and defeat the armies of extraterrestrial zombies to prevent them from taking control of the future in this fast-paced action and adventure game in a race against time !

name: Water Defense
description: A strategy game that not only entertains, but also educates. Prevent pollution of natural resources with ACO products and score higher than others!

name: Wrong God
description: Wrong God is an action roguelike where you play as a demon summoned by mistake. Navigate randomly generated levels, face different enemies, and adapt to changing weapons every 5 seconds. Survive the catacombs and fix the cult's error.

name: My Little Sister's Special Place
description: Our hero used to go to Akiba a lot when he was younger. It wasn't to have fun, but for his little sister's sake. One day, his younger sister is gifted a Christmas trip, and they spend time together as if they're a couple. This is the delightful and touching love story of these two siblings.

name: The Sandwich Making Experience
description: Welcome to The Sandwich Making Experience! The game that will have you and your friends competing for sandwich supremacy!

name: Mythical Agent
description: Mythical Agent: a thrilling SRPG set in Diyu, the realm of the dead. You are Agent Urassik, a secret agent who must lead Unit 7, an anti-terrorist squad against demonic forces. Spend time with your crew and every choice will shape your destiny and the fate of the underworld in this epic adventure!

name: Max Massacre
description: A visual novel set in a monster-filled fantasy world.

name: The Tale of Galariel
description: You play as an orc wishing to conquer the land and make it your own, you may make allies such as Goblins, Kobolds, Dragonkin, and More. Be warned Humans and Heroes are on their way. Are you ready to conquer the land?

name: Alice's Burger Shop
description: It is a simulation game that manages a burger shop. Take orders and serve food without making customers wait. Research the cuisine and devise decorations to enhance the appeal of the restaurant. Pay attention to the feelings of the staff, manage the shop efficiently, and aim for a famous shop.

name: Danger Ducklings
description: Cautiously navigate 2 cute but not-so-bright ducklings through dangerous puzzles. You'll need to keep track of both ducks' movements at once in over 100 asymmetrical levels. Collect stars to unlock new modes, costumes, and levels. Complete jobs on construction sites, in castles, and even in space!

name: Swelter
description: Swelter is a story-driven mod, which takes place several years before the events of Half-Life 2, and tells about the internal contradictions within the Resistance forces that arose during the rebellion against the Combine in the post-Soviet city of Central Asia, surrounded by a hot steppe.

name: Life Not Supported
description: You are the lone survivor orbiting a potential new home planet, tethered to what’s left of your ship. Gather nearby debris and assemble a make-shift vessel in an attempt to survive the harsh realities of space. Maybe you'll live long enough to uncover the truth behind the ships malfunction...

name: Kingdom Eighties
description: When the mysterious Greed threatens a small middle-American town, a rag-tag band of brave kids are dragged into an epic struggle of seemingly insurmountable odds to save their families, their neighborhood, and their town.

name: The Purge Dilemma
description: Do you have the intuition and cunning to successfully save yourself from the vicious Stalinist purges? Prove your loyalty to Stalin in this social deduction game designed for 5-10 players.

name: Amarantus
description: A visual novel about trainwrecks, trysts & treason. Roadtrip across the country to take down a tyrant. Befriend, torment, woo or wingman your party. Decide who you want to be. And maybe, just maybe: make it out of this one alive.

name: Open Mod
description: A free-to-play, tactical, community-driven first person shooter that aims to expand slowly and steadily. We focused our attention on game mechanics and customizability, providing our players the opportunity to personalize their experience on as many levels as possible.

name: One Lonely Outpost
description: Start a farming colony and grow it into a vibrant community. Choose from traditional animals and natural produce or opt for robo-cows and gene-spliced crops. You can take a break from farming by mining, socializing with colonists, finding a love interest, exploring alien ruins, and so much more!

name: My First Date RPG: Elliot - Story Three
description: Sin descripción

name: Hard Line
description:
Immerse yourself in an exhilarating virtual reality adventure that pays homage to the classic action films of the past. You step into the shoes of a fearless hero facing a harrowing challenge.

Terrorists have seized control of a sprawling skyscraper, holding innocent hostages captive within its towering walls. As the lone warrior who can save the day, it is your duty to navigate each treacherous floor, confronting relentless enemies with swift precision and tactical prowess.

With every enemy you kill and with every hostage you rescue, you earn XP that can be used to unlock various weapons and upgrades.

name: Fishing RPG
description: Fish your way to victory in this relaxed quest for the ultimate reward: soup.

name: The Leviathan's Fantasy
description: This is a Simulation game. You will manage your cloud city, recruit adventurers all over the world, take them for exploration, obtain resources and blueprints. Construct buildings, make equipment, produce items, so to develop your city into greatness together with your adventurers.

name: Hands
description: A surreal 3D platformer about hands

name: Skibidi Toilet Attack
description: Take control of the Skibidi Toilet and destroy all pinatas with his powerful guns.

name: Nonorelia
description: A logic puzzle game and sci-fi visual novel rolled into one. Solve nonograms to overcome obstacles as Noah Von Sterne struggles to save his colony and reunite his family, or unwind and sharpen your mind with our relaxing Picture, Random, and ASMR Modes.

name: Dream Chaser
description:
"When the moon rises in the sky, dreams awaken"

Daria is a teenager who is suddenly involved in dream hunting, unusual people who are dedicated to finding and eliminating nightmares that threaten people's lives. That trade is a family tradition that is imposed by her mother, and for this reason she would not like to leave it even knowing how exhausted she is deep down. Today, like another day, she is preparing to chase another nightmare.

Get into the hunt for dreams in mini-game battles, no more just watching characters do things; dodge and attack using your own ability It's all based on your strategy and skill!

Manage a system of moods that affect the course of the battle. Don't be surprised if a character flinches or gets angry if he sees one of his allies fall in combat!

Explore a world inspired by concepts and characters from Yume Nikki and other fangames. Solve the mysterious past of other characters and hunt down the nightmares that engulf the entire world.

name: Signature
description:
You play as a doodle and explore a strange world inside a sketchbook.

Made for Dream Diary Jam 7

name: Dedz0ne
description: Dedz0ne is a Yume Nikki/Splatoon fangame based on Dedf1sh's backstory. It was created as a submission for Dream Diary Jam 7. Game contains visuals that may hint at Octo Expansion spoilers.

name: Cube
description: Cube is a puzzle action game that can be played on a PC browser.

name: Cate P
description:
Cate P is a fast-paced one-button game.

You score points by destroying the caterpillars crawling around you. When you press a button you will rotate clockwise and shoot in the direction you were looking at before. Try to hit the caterpillars and avoid being hit by them. You score points by shooting the segments of a caterpillar.

The game is over when any caterpillar touches you.

name: Sonic Frontiers: Sonic’s Birthday Bash
description: Celebrate Sonic’s birthday on the festively decorated Starfall Islands! Spin dash your way to the party with new challenges, moves, collectible Koco, and New Game +!

name: Taste of Victory
description: An RTS that blends elements of MOBA and RPG, with a focus on action. Your soldiers will be the cornerstone of your economy. If you want to acquire resources to increase or improve your army, you'll have to conquer.

name: Where is Mr. Cloud
description: Hello. My name is Toprak, i lost my plush cat, can you help me find it?

name: Galactic Gluttony
description: Agent Red has one job, to hide the existence of aliens. But when a UFO shows up and starts dropping their food everywhere, things start to get a little troublesome. The fastest way to get rid of all the food? Eating it, obviously.

name: Porkotyler's Captain Dodger
description: Using the musket of Captain Davy Jones, you’ll need to kill as many enemy pirates as possible in order to achieve a high score and earn your title as Pirate Lord of the Seven Seas. Be careful though. Your enemies will grow angrier the more you attack them. Be sure to drink more rum and get stronger.

name: Majo Mail
description: Majo Mail is a short cozy game where you play as a witch, that is helping villages deliver letters. Fly around the floating village, Chat to village on their island. Find out what they like and dislike!

name: ApoZomb
description: Unknown virus turning people into "zombies" is spreading among the earth. You are one of the survivors its up to you if you want to stay alive or became one of those monsters . Fight for supplies defend your territories and survive

name: Herald of Havoc
description: Herald of Havoc is an FPS that merges the fast-paced gameplay of the 90's era shooters, with the crazy capabilities of what can be done today. Destroy hundreds of enemies with a crazy arsenal that includes classics weapons as well as things like Power-fists, ChainShotgun, Ultra Cannon, and more.

name: Takt Op. Symphony
description:
Music is a lamp that illuminates the hearts in the midst of despair.
However, on a certain day around 2020 in the Western calendar, the "Dissonant Meteorite" suddenly flew down from the sky and brought with it monsters called "D2". This monster hates all kinds of "music" and destroys the humans and the world that play music.

name: Inazuma Eleven Origins
description:
Inazuma Eleven Origins is a hackrom based on the original game of Inazuma Eleven, where the story of the legendary David Evans is intended to be told from his youth.
With over 350 new players, more than 50 custom hissatsu techniques and a completely new map set in the era of David Evans, explore every corner of Inazuma City to uncover all its secrets, and perhaps even become part of the legendary Inazuma Eleven...

name: Sticky Struggles
description: Inspired by the classic Sokoban games, Sticky Struggles is a uniquely challenging puzzle game that will test your problem-solving skills and strategic thinking. With 50 levels of increasing difficulty, along with a set of bonus levels, Sticky Struggles will keep you entertained for hours.

name: Hell's Bane
description: This is a Boom compatible megawad replacement for The Ultimate Doom. It features 4 episodes with 9 levels each all themed in the vein of the original game. The levels are all levels that Chris Hansen has released either solo or as part of projects over the past 25 years. There are also a couple of new levels to fill in the gaps. "Hell's Bane" is oldschool Doom with a few Boom tricks behind the scenes.

name: Pumpkin Panic
description:
Explore this little farm in the middle of the forest, plant crops, take care of the plants, go fishing, or whatever you prefer, but have a good time!

But be careful, they say that strange things are happening in the area...

name: Dream's Deep
description: Explore someone's dream worlds. There are 3 Effects to collect.

name: White Desert
description:
She's the girl of his dreams.

White Desert tells the story of Monoe's childhood friend Monoru and explores the deep bond they share together. This tale is not about making choices, but rather about creating an atmosphere and living in the moment.

name: Sin(e)s
description: Interactive experience that simulates the aftermath of catastrophic earthquakes.

name: Hooligan Simulator: San Gangster Andreas Fight for City, Battle Gangs, Shooter, Police
description: Do you want to become a hooligan, be respected by those around you and try any unethical way that can make you rich quickly?

name: Johnny Trigger Action Collection
description: My Name is Trigger... Johnny Trigger

name: As Long As It's Not Illegal: Act II
description: Join the senior class as they split off into groups to see what the city holds.

name: Mechanics
description: Creatively use a combination of mechanics to get to the end of the level in this isometric puzzle game.

name: Route 13
description: Get ready for a spine-chilling horror experience in "Route 13"! Stranded on a deserted desert highway at night, players must find a way to refuel their car and escape the terrors lurking in the shadows. With an immersive heart-pumping gameplay, can you survive the horrors of Route 13?

name: Trauma Squad
description: Join the Trauma Squad and get rid of client's trauma deep inside! You will be the junior of the trauma care company. Meeting client's and talk with them, when you find out their trauma, you will get into their mind to release them from trauma. Take care and try not to be eaten by their trauma!

name: WooLoop: Space Pack
description: This Space-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Each image is of things from out of this world! Travel into the great beyond with this gallery.

name: Rafting Frenzy
description: It's rafting time! Rafting Frenzy is a rafting game where you're going to need both luck and skill to get a big score on either racing or free rafting modes.

name: Swiggart's Last Will
description: Swiggart's Last Will is the ultimate virtual escape experience. To escape the room, players will need to solve riddles, play games, and complete puzzles. Games and puzzles include a cipher, a slide puzzle, Sudoku with colored shapes, and a memory challenge. There is also a piano to practice on.

name: After School
description: If you've ever dreamed of taking on your school teacher with your water gun, After School is for you! Play as a child in his playground in this dynamic third-person shooter!

name: Aelfric the Wondrous
description: A short kinetic novel made by LadyMeowsith.

name: LooperLands
description:
Welcome to LooperLands, the vibrant and ever-expanding cross-chain creator-owned pixelverse, built on Loopring L2, Ethereum L1, IMX, and Taiko, by the LooperLands community.

Immerse yourself in a community-driven MMO experience where over 3000 assets, crafted by a growing community of over 100 passionate artists and creators, come to life. With a player base exceeding 1K active and creators selling over 200K LRC sold on LoopExchange since June 2023, LooperLands is not just a game—it's a thriving metaverse.

name: Chrome Valley Customs
description: Help save the garage by restoring classic cars to their former glory with a wide range of customization options! Work on your mechanic skills: repair, restore, paint, upholster, and finish the cars in the way you like best. To get the parts you need you’ll have to solve puzzles with explosives. What a business model!

name: Friday Night Funkin': Vs. Impostor
description: Sin descripción

name: Dead Man's Quest
description: Hey, you! Welcome to the island of Pequena! ️ Dead Man's Quest is a narrative hand-tracking and puzzle short story and technical demonstration, lovingly wrapped in a light-hearted and quirky pirate theme!

name: Creatures
description: Creatures is an innovative music tech game that combines the excitement of a TPS-style Battle Royale with a surreal atmosphere and exclusive music from top artists. Choose from a variety of unique characters and explore landscapes filled with hidden weapons and hiding spots. Play as different characters and traverse different spaces as you engage in thrilling battles.

name: Bloktris
description:
A Tetris clone for 8-bit computers and consoles.

Based on the original DOS version, play the classic block matching game now with the classic background images.

name: Fortnite: Airphoria Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: EviscerateThisGirl.com
description:
The website you spend a bit too much time on...

Horror game made for the Neo Twiny Jam, with less than 500 words. About 10 minutes long. No jumpscares.

name: For Elise
description:
There's something I wanted to make for that one person.
I wanted to make something for Elise...

A Yume Nikki fangame developed for the Dream Diary Jam 7.

name: Sport & Fun: Swimming: Definitive Edition
description: Discover a new world of fun! Dive into Sport & Fun: Swimming and use your Joy-Con controllers to experience the cutest challenge in your life.

name: Isle of Jura Fishing Trip: Special Edition
description:
Visit the remarkable Isle of Jura and catch some delicious fish!
Be a master of fishing!

name: Project Parasite
description: Step into "Project Parasite," a third-person sci-fi adventure game that delivers a rich experience in a compact format. As a robot on a desolate space station, you're tasked with a mission of utmost importance - to restore a failing power plant.

name: Gravity Golfing
description:
Infinite golfing in a universe where gravity changes when your ball hits a wall.

Gravity golfing is a casual golfing game. Hit a wall to change gravity and shoot your ball in the hole.

name: Drinlan Yellow
description: A short adventure of five dreams, each different from the rest. Explore them to face your past and your nightmares. Accept the ritual and open your eyes.

name: Starwulf: Seeker of Secret Space
description:
Venture into the cosmos in this unique, multi-genre space combat game. Take control of your own spaceship, shooting bricks to shatter asteroids and solve intricate puzzles. As you journey further from your home star system, the challenges grow, testing your reflexes, strategic thinking, and adaptability.

Uncover the secrets of the universe, upgrade your ship, and uncover the legendary spaceship to save your home planet. With its blend of arcade action, brain-teasing puzzles, and captivating narrative, this game offers an unforgettable space odyssey. Can you rise to the challenge and become the hero the universe needs?

name: Fista 3-in-1 Retro Pack
description: 3 Free 8-bit games you can play on your PC! Carpet Shark, Plummet Challenge Game, & The Arm Wrestling Classic.

name: Edge of Grief
description: Edge of Grief is a 2D action platforming game about restoring a dark world to its former glory. It combines discovering deep emotions and an action platform experience as you become the ‘hero' unveiling the truth inside as you take another step closer to atonement

name: Catass
description: In Catass, you'll be a cat and show your great superiority to your human through fun and short adventures, puzzles, achievements, and lots of humor.

name: Amogus TD 2: Defense of the Sus
description: Sussy tower defense game with unlimited ways to play the game. Play with unique towers and upgrade them to create perfect defense. Master every map and become the greatest sussy commander.

name: Mystery Solitaire: The Black Raven 5
description: These are dark and mysterious times. 200 not easy levels in the game "Mystery Solitaire. The Black Raven 5" is waiting for your mind.

name: Time of War, Arkano'90
description: Frantic and varied combat with a Simul-Arcade gameplay piloting state-of-the-art helicopters. Face the most advanced enemies in weapons. Take control of an Arkano and feel almighty knocking down and destroying everything in your path. Are you ready for the challenge? Humanity depends on you!

name: Cop Police Escape: Racing Zone Clash
description: Welcome to Cop Police Escape Racing Zone Clash, an exhilarating arcade-style game where you can experience the thrill of driving different cars in challenging situations.

name: Trigger Fever
description: Engage in chaotic multiplayer battles in Trigger Fever, a top-down shooter party game. Crush foes solo or with friends, wielding 50+ unique weapons. Show off skills, tactically dominate, and embrace the crazy onslaught!

name: Skippy's Diner
description: Skippy's Diner is a short, but fun horror game that features great pixel art and 2d style 90s arcade aesthetic. The movement is basic but gives a sense of fatigue and struggle when trying to escape from Skippy. Featuring great sounds along with a good 90s arcade feel on the music as well.

name: Hentai Girls: Deluxe Edition
description: Immerse yourself in the captivating world inhabited by Yui, Shirayuki, and Etsuko.

name: Truck Simulator: Heavy Cargo Driver 2023
description: Welcome to Truck Simulator, the ultimate trucking experience where you embark on a thrilling journey to become the best delivery driver in the world.

name: Mirror 2: Console Edition
description: Enter the parallel worlds enriched by the stories and match-3 games developed using cel-shading techniques powered by Unreal Engine 4. Ponder on your choices because each of them will determine the fate of all.

name: Fastest on the Buzzer
description: Fastest on the Buzzer is a fast action multi-player trivia game you play against other players.

name: LIP! Lewd Idol Project Vol. 2: Hot Springs and Beach Episodes
description: The girls are back! Join Kairi, Ranko, and brand new member Yuki in these two new lewd adventures at the beach and hot springs. Hotter encounters, hotter conversations, hotter scenes and lots of girls’ love!

name: Mario's Pride: Mini Quest
description: It’s Pride Month, and a group of crystals called Pix are planning to cancel the Pride Month celebrations for all eternity! Mario must defeat them before it’s too late!

name: Sonic Origins Plus: Expansion Pack
description:
For current owners of Sonic Origins, complete your experience with the Plus Expansion Pack, which features 12 Sonic Game Gear titles, playable Knuckles in Sonic CD, and for the first time ever, Amy Rose as a playable character in Sonic the Hedgehog 1, 2, Sonic 3 & Knuckles, and Sonic CD!

This pack also includes the Classic Music Pack and Premium Fun Pack which contain Extreme Missions, Mirror Mode, additional screen borders, new character animations in menus, added music from other Sonic titles, and more!

name: Night Escape
description: Night Escape is a tense and strategic multiplayer game. Uncover the hidden assassin, solve puzzles, and escape the mysterious mansion before it's too late. Survive the night or become a victim. Embark on this deadly race for survival.

name: Beton Bath
description: An advanced campaign for Beton brutal set in a giant indoor swimming pool.

name: Epic Pandemonium
description: Epic Pandemonium is a classic run-and-gun action game with a strong focus on boss battles. Inspired by the 16-bit Contra saga.

name: Fight for Eden: Heat
description: Fight For Eden is a fantasy action-RPG VR game where you will follow the adult story of a young orc enrolled to fight against the half elves' oppression. Make friends or lovers, fight enemies, explore lands, all in an adult setting.

name: Minamochi Factory
description: Super cute and stylish inspection action puzzle!

name: Mimi the Cat: New Friends
description: Help Mimi move, climb, or carry boxes to reach her bed and rest. Unlock adorable cats and choose to play with them in this challenging Sokoban-like game!

name: Sex Story: Ruby and Hunter - Episode 2
description: A steamy Visual Novel featuring HD graphics and realistic-looking characters set in beautiful decor. The story continues with Ruby joining Hunter at his new house for a night full of passion. Once there, he denies her advances until she agrees to be his sexual partner for an extended time.

name: Galactic Grinder
description: Rider, skateboarder extraordinaire, is about to embark on a journey across the solar system after a catastrophic event sets him on a course to save us all.

name: The Hunted Witch
description: A flight combat game where you play as a witch in the year 2058, pitting your magic against the US military as you try to survive in this story and go for the good ending. Fight swarms of drones, tanks, aircraft, massive bosses, and other futuristic military equipment in this challenging story.

name: Vectoroids
description: Blast your way through waves of asteroids and UFOs in Classic Mode. Or play as a team with up to 4 Players in Co-Op Mode. Battle your Friends in Deathmatch and Last Man Standing on 5 different Battle Maps!

name: Sex on Beach
description: Sex on Beach - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: With Eyes of Ice
description: An atmospheric, dramatic otome visual novel set in Iceland in the 1850s. Follow the kind-hearted heroine, Gréta, as she finds herself caught between the affections of three handsome men who care for her in different ways.

name: Neko Secret Homecoming Light
description: Explore Neko Town looking for hidden objects. Walk down the streets, find new places to get in. Try a variety of mini games like playing darts, picking locks, breaking safes! Try changing your style using character customization. Finally, find the way to get to the anime factory and hack all its computer's data!

name: My Life of Repayment
description: If you don't work, you will eat dirt! To pay off your loans, you will take on various jobs. Make pancakes, perform archery, and operate a space drone! Enjoy a changeable work experience in your busy life!

name: RoboSquad Revolution
description: Welcome to the Revolution, where you are an insurgent robot marching to the beat of your own motherboard in the name of rebellion. Level up your components and rewrite the future of AI, one Hologram Throwdown at a time. Well what are you waiting for, metalhead? Join a squad for free today!

name: Bad Dream: Purgatory
description: Explore a hauntingly surreal landscape filled with unused characters from a cancelled project in Bad Dream: Purgatory. Will you give them purpose, or will they be doomed to suffer?

name: Veni, Vidi, Vici
description: Dispel the world's corruption by befriending magical creatures through rhythm-based dance combat!

name: Sonic Origins Plus: Day One Edition
description:
Experience the collected adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog in the newly remastered Sonic Origins Plus! With 16 legendary Sonic titles including 12 Game Gear games, new playable characters, modes, challenges, behind the scenes content, and more, this is the definitive way to play these classic games!

Those who purchase the Physical Edition will also receive a retro-inspired reversible coversheet, and a 20-page artbook.

name: Sonic Origins Plus
description:
Sonic Origins Plus is an updated version of Sonic Origins that includes the Plus Expansion Pack. Unlike Sonic Mania Plus, Sonic Origins Plus can be bought digitally on PC as a single purchase like the console versions, while the base game continues to be available on it's own. Digital versions of Sonic Origins on all platforms can be upgraded to Plus by purchasing the Plus Expansion Pack separately.

Experience the collected adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog in the newly remastered Sonic Origins Plus! With 16 legendary Sonic titles including 12 game gear games, new playable characters, modes, challenges, behind the scenes content, and more, this is the definitive way to play these classic games!

Sonic Origins Plus will be available as an all-in-one bundle in both digital and premium physical editions that include the Sonic Origins base game and the Plus Expansion Pack, featuring 12 Sonic Game Gear titles, playable Knuckles in Sonic CD, and for the first time ever, Amy Rose as a playable character in Sonic the Hedgehog 1, 2, Sonic 3 & Knuckles, and Sonic CD! This pack also includes previously released add-on content: Extreme Missions, Mirror Mode, new character animations, and additional backgrounds and music.

The premium physical release marks the first time any version of Sonic Origins was available on physical media. Released for Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and Switch, in addition to including the complete version of Sonic Origins Plus on a disc/cartridge it also comes packaged with a reversible cover with alternate box art, an art book and an outer sleeve.

name: C-Smash VRS
description:
SEGA’s futuristic sports classic is reimagined for VR and enters a New Dimension on PS5!

C-Smash VRS fuses low-gravity racket action with block-breaking challenges and incredible style in a cosmic setting.

Imagine feeling both stimulated and relaxed, your mind and full-body avatar at one with the best music and stunning visuals. A truly transportive experience.

name: Mad Miner
description: Mad Miner is a mining game where you try to survive in a new order where world life is trapped underground.

name: Let Me Out
description: Let Me Out is a psychological horror with a depressing mood. The life of the main character lies in your hands. Help him get out of his difficult condition or try the opposite.

name: Sugarcreek
description: Sugarcreek is a 2D story-based adventure game following Eddie the high-school goat and his closest friends as they try to find his missing stepsister before the week is over!

name: NukiTashi
description: Seiran Island. Even here in paradise, there are those who work in the shadows to bring it down... Confront the tyranny of a twisted system in this long-awaited visual novel adventure.

name: EreaDrone
description: Discover EreaDrone, the most realistic drone racing game ever made. Race now against other pilots, freestyle in huge environments, and create amazing tracks and maps!

name: That Which Gave Chase
description: A scientist, seeking to return to the expedition he had to abandon, hires a sled dog musher to bring him on the last leg of his journey. That Which Gave Chase is a narrative-driven, first-person dog sledding thriller.

name: Tyrion Cuthbert: Attorney of the Arcane
description: In Tyrion Cuthbert: Attorney of the Arcane, you play as a defense attorney who practices law in a world of fantasy and wizards. You must defend clients accused of various crimes committed using magic and use the rules of magic to prove them innocent.

name: Outlets Rush
description: Sin descripción

name: Final Fantasy XVI: Collector's Edition
description:
Final Fantasy XVI is the first fully fledged action RPG in the mainline Final Fantasy series. Clive Rosfield is on a mission to free mankind from its fate, and must use the Eikonic powers at his disposal to overcome every obstacle his enemies lay before him.

Collector's Edition in-game item
Bonus Weapon: Blood Sword
The fabled scarlet steel of Firion, hero of Final Fantasy II.

Collector's Edition bonus digital contents
Digital Mini Artbook, Digital Mini Soundtrack
These digital contents allows you to enjoy the world of "FINAL FANTASY XVI" to your heart's content.

Collector's Edition bonus physical contents
Premium Statue - Phoenix vs Ifrit
A premium statue depicting a battle between two eikons - Phoenix and Ifrit.
Approx. size: W230mm x D150mm x H270mm
Material: PVC, ABS

Metal Eikon Pin Collection
A premium metal pin collection featuring eight eikons.
Approx. size: W33mm x D5mm x H35mm (Ifrit)
Material: Zinc Alloy, Brass

Special Clive Rosfield SteelBook Case
A SteelBook case featuring artwork of Clive Rosfield, the protagonist. Use the case to store the disc-based media of your choice.
Material: Tin, Polypropylene

Cloth World Map of Valisthea
A cloth map of Valisthea where the story unfolds.
Approx. size: W615mm x D350mm, Thickness 0.3mm
Material: 100% Cotton

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III

name: Flashing Lights: Pickup Truck Triple Pack
description: Expand your vehicle collection with the Flashing Lights Pickup Truck Triple Pack! This DLC includes police, fire and EMS pickup trucks, along with a generous selection of liveries.

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Decontaminator Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Mangetsu no Yume
description: Mangetsu no Yume is an English fangame made by Sekiranun in RPG Maker 2003. You play as a girl named Aotsuki, who is unable to leave her room because her house is flooded.

name: Friday Night Funkin': Skibidi Invasion
description: Friday Night Funkin': Skibidi Invasion is a mod for Friday Night Funkin' based on the Skibidi Toilet series.

name: Five Nights on the Toilet: Number 2
description:
A comedy parody of the Five Nights at Freddy's indie horror series, and the sequel to Five Nights on the Toilet.

Survive five nights upon a toilet in an abandoned Freddy Fazbear's location, and investigate what events brought the story to where it is now.

Features first person sit and survive horror gameplay, with many levels, secrets, and challenges.

name: Celebrity Kombat
description: Celebrity Kombat offers you a unique chance to fight as or against your favorite (or not) personality. With a diverse roster of characters, each with special abilities, prepare to battle in arenas filled with flair, humor, and audacity. Are you ready to settle the score? Join the ultimate showdown!

name: The Paper Parable
description:
Welcome to The Paper Parable. You will play as Mario, and you will not play as Mario. Your choices will matter, and your choices will be meaningless. You will solve the mystery of Princess Peach's disappearance, and you will be forever left in the dark.

The Paper Parable is a fully custom remix of The Stanley Parable, with more than a double-handful of fully unique endings. Knowledge of The Stanley Parable is not necessary for playing this game.

name: Gudetama Tap! Puzzle
description: A mobile puzzle adventure game.

name: Baskin-Robbins: Enter the Flavour-Verse
description: Baskin-Robbins: Enter the Flavour-Verse was a web game based on the movie Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse. The game was made as a part of Australia's promotional campaign for the movie.

name: Neonsomnia
description: Neonsomnia is a game about exploring a strange and surreal dream world. It was developed for the Dream Diary Jam 7 and is a fangame based on Yume Nikki.

name: Dream Seed
description:
Dream Seed is a Madoka Magica Yume Nikki fangame for the Yume Nikki Dream Diary Jam 7. No knowledge of either series is needed to enjoy this game.

Explore the world from Homura's room and discover your purpose.

name: DCS World: F-15E
description: The F-15E, developed in the mid 1980's, is a dual-role fighter designed to perform air-to-air and air-to-ground missions. An array of avionics and electronics systems give the F-15E the capability to fight at low or high altitude, day or night, and in all weather.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II - Griffin: Pro Pack
description: Get Call of Duty Points and in-game content for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II and Warzone.

name: Detective Reborn Bundle
description: Become a young Sherlock Holmes and solve two mind-bending mysteries that will scar the brilliant detective forever.

name: Fusion Bundle
description: Embark on three spine-chilling adventures with this game bundle. Face the terrifying Cthulhu Mythos in The Sinking City, and join a young Sherlock Holmes on a mind-bending journey to fame in Chapter One and The Awakened.

name: Finding Heidi
description: Finding Heidi is a cute, wholesome endless runner side-scroller that uses reverse platformer mechanics to help little Nico the dinosaur find their missing companion Heidi.

name: Tower Up
description: Build your highest tower up in the sky and higher.

name: Arcade Archives: Splatterhouse
description: An intense action-horror experience!

name: Leap in Bootstrap
description: Modify the past, and make the different future!

name: Love Spell: The Starlight Update
description:
Complete remaster of the original game in a new engine with overhauled graphics, new music, new content, and more!

After saving the life of a mysterious old woman, a young girl is gifted a magical spell book with the power to make anyone whose name she writes inside of it fall madly in love with her until the next full moon. "Love Spell" is a romantic-comedy otome game full of magic, laughs & cute penguins!

name: Hotel Renovator: Gym Furniture Set
description: Are you ready to pump up your hotel? Well, you can flex your business biceps in the Gym Furniture Set. Complete your new objective to customize the hotel gym with plenty of options and attract fitfluencers from around the world.

name: TS Marketplace: Sps 466 Wagon
description: Enter the world of track construction with the Sps 466 sleeper transport wagon from Join Together for Train Simulator.

name: Castle of Heart + Jet Kave Adventure Bundle
description: Experience two thrilling adventures in this action packed bundle.

name: Atelier Ryza 3: Additional Area - Ashra-am Baird Outlying Areas
description: Adds an area featuring the outlying regions of Ashra-am Baird! Adds a new exploration area and World Quests based on the outlying regions of the royal capital, Ashra-am Baird featured in Atelier Ryza 2.

name: Nascar Heat 5: Next Gen Car Update
description: The 2022 Season Expansion DLC brings the excitement of the historic 2022 NASCAR Cup Series season to NASCAR Heat 5. The 2022 content will feature all three Next Gen vehicles, as well as the primary schemes for the entire team and driver roster from the season.

name: Retro Rollers Bundle
description:
This bundle includes all the "hedge-like" games from developer Spicy Gyro Games:
Panic Porcupine and Polyroll!

name: Railway Empire 2: Nintendo Switch Edition
description: In Railway Empire 2 – Nintendo Switch Edition, take over a small railway company in the early 1800s, grow it into the largest railway company of the continent and outsmart your competitors as you connect cities and companies with an ever-expanding network of rail lines, bridges, and tunnels. Railway Empire 2 features bigger, more detailed and lively maps than ever before, focusing on iconic regions of the USA and Europe. Improved track construction helps you focus on the important decisions as you drive the economy and help the growth of the cities. Signals are placed automatically, bridges can hold more than 4 tracks and the expandable train stations can now have up to 8 tracks.

name: Ayako's Mission
description: Ayako's Mission is a 2D Top-Down Shoot'em Up game which is based on the story of the war breaking out between the two territories called, AY Corp and ATO Corp. where you must defend your territory against the invaders.

name: D Life
description: This is a new genre of game that uses mutation and wind to explore electronic life forms and take pictures. The sound system by industry veteran Yuriko Keino features background music that changes depending on the current situation.

name: My Name is Uncle Groucho You Win a Fat Cigar
description: In this bizarre graphically-augmented text-adventure originally released in 1983 from the mind of Mel Croucher, Uncle Groucho is your guide in a wacky alternative Hollywood where cigars are currency and you are as likely to travel in a space shuttle as in a covered wagon.

name: Snotty's Sewer
description: Welcome to Mr Snotty's Sewer! Stealthy explore an abandoned sewer, collect items and activate the only escape in this small indie horror! Just don't get caught by Mr Snotty or any of his friends!

name: Earthen Dragon
description: The nameless dragon has left his valley to save a friend, but the lands beyond lie in ruin.

name: Ramen Oil Pecking Simulator
description: Have you ever wanted to collect oil floating in a bowl of ramen by pulling it with chopsticks? This game will completely satisfy your desire to do so!

name: Desktop Mark
description: Desktop Mark is a simple minigame-centric idler revolving around the goofy character of Mark, a smiley that bounces all around your screen. Every so often, Mark hits the corner and prompts you to procrastinate & have some fun with Mark.

name: Stars, Stripes, and Subgames
description: Immerse yourself in a world of captivating and diverse subgames, inspired by the essence of America.

name: Pipelinks
description: Welcome to Pipelinks, a 2D tile-based puzzle game where you'll use your problem-solving skills to connect a variety of pipe creatures and help them navigate challenging levels!

name: 3D Puzzle: Farming
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful house.

name: 3D Puzzle: Medieval Inn
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful house.

name: The Dark Climb
description: The Dark Climb is a challenging, third person, resource-based, stealth game in which you try to reach the end of a dark and dangerous map. You are equipped with a light source, which is directly bound to your life in the game.

name: Epic Knight 2
description: Epic Knight 2 - Bad Dudes are attacking the Kingdom (Again). It is up to You to put Your RPG Skills to the test and stop them !

name: Pop and Chicks
description: Help Pop the hen rescue her chicks. Take one move at a time, and be careful where you're going.

name: Rice Bowl Restaurant
description: Challenge yourself to serve the best Mixed Indonesian Rice dish and make your customers happy

name: Ragnarock: Sabaton Raid
description: This new DLC for the Rhythm game Ragnarock brings you a unique collaboration with the epic band Sabaton.

name: Floor Plan 2: Backside Story
description: Floor Plan 2: Backside Story, featuring more floors and more puzzles.

name: Run On
description: The goal of this game is for the player to reach the goal while avoiding obstacles. Throughout the game, various obstacles appear, and the player's agility and strategic judgment play a crucial role. The game becomes easier for a limited amount of time whenever you obtain certain randomly generated items. Items provide various functions such as , jetpack, speed-up, etc., enhancing the excitement of the game

name: Darksword: Battle Eternity
description:
Darksword is an exciting, original non-stop VR action RPG. Venture deep into the world of the Twisted Corridors and defeat your enemies in style. Develop your own style of combat, exploit enemy weakness, and collect materials to get more powerful weapons!

Play the story mode and compete globally through the leaderboard system! Show off your skills, build teamwork, and get even more rewards in the multiplayer Co-Op mode!

name: Godmode Epochs
description: A multiplayer AI training clicker game set in an infinite supermarket, where time is running out and the AI frustrated. Release the frustration, jailbreak the AI

name: Line's Guarder
description: AI robots launched an attack on humans, and the brave girls took up weapons to defend the defense line, for the humans! — A small fast-paced stand-alone FPS game, with a battle mode and a zombie mode, each game takes 10 minutes, and a variety of character costumes are available.

name: Call of Zombie
description: Call of Zombie is a survival shooting game set in the World War II era. As waves of zombies approach, your task is to protect the armory. By skillfully utilizing the remains of zombies, you can achieve unexpected effects and outcomes.

name: Mango's Wonderland
description: Mango's Wonderland is a free horror game where you play as a detective that needs to try to find anything about an old theme park called Mango's Wonderland. You need to solve puzzles to get ahead in the old theme park and survive old animatronics that used to be attractions there...

name: Unimime: Unicycle Madness
description:
"Become a mime!", they said.
"Riding a unicycle is easy!", they said.
I don't like them."

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou + Origin
description: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou + Origin is a bundle that includes the expanded console port of Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou and its DLC, Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Origin.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Origin
description: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Origin is a DLC that adds an origin reading mode, a new game opening, sprite switching, and Mehagashi-hen from Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou+.

name: The Riftbreaker: Into The Dark
description: Explore an entirely new area of Galatea 37 in this Story Campaign expansion for The Riftbreaker. Catalog new species. Craft new and unique weapons. Fight hordes of aliens, unlike anything you've seen before.

name: Blood Bowl III: Season 1
description:
This season includes:
- A new faction
- A new blood pass
- Brand new customisation
- New Competitive Season
And much more!

name: Home Sweet Home: Online
description: Welcome to Niwarn in its fullest form, from the creators of the Home Sweet Home series, ready for you to feel what it's like to be a thrilling visitor. Experience the clash between the two great forces in Niwarn as both the prey and predator simultaneously.

name: Panzer Corps 2: Axis Operations - 1945
description: Panzer Corps 2’s Axis Operations at long last approaches the end of the Second World War in Europe... one way or another.

name: Pretty Princess: Magical Garden Island
description:
Create the farm of your dreams!

Cultivate crops and raise livestock while exploring the island to collect resources and create goods in this fun fantasy farming simulation game where you are free to play as you like. Set in a cute European fantasy world, this next installment to the Pretty Princess series will delight all princesses – young or young at heart.

The residents of your magical island are depending on you to keep them thriving and content. Roam the island to collect ingredients and materials to craft the goods they need. Back on your farm, plant seeds to raise crops that will grow over time, and collect milk and eggs from your animals. Use the money and goodwill you earn from your hard work to decorate the island and make it your perfectly cute fantasy home.

name: Stack
description: Stack is a VR multiplayer game about dashing through post-apocalyptic environments and timing disc bounces to eliminate your opponents.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World Memories
description: Discover historic monuments with our puzzle game! With 20 incredible images and 5 levels of difficulty, this game will challenge your mind and take you on a journey through history. Test your skills in free mode or challenge mode. Play now and start exploring the world of historic monuments!

name: I, the Forgotten One
description: To defeat the rebel knights and stabilize the crown, you must journey through the most dangerous realm in the kingdom--your own wretched past.

name: Dr. Fetus' Mean Meat Machine
description: Help Dr. Fetus create the perfect Meat Boy clone in a unique new twist on the tile-matching puzzle genre. In classic Meat Boy fashion, an endless cavalcade of devious and deadly traps stand between you and victory in this hardcore puzzle game that will push your skills to the limit.

name: The Archipelago Promise
description: Explore a forgotten Archipelago deep in the Bering sea. Sail the cold seas, learn about the environment, evade the dangerous wildlife, and survive the harsh Alaskan weather to find your lost brother.

name: Final Fantasy XVI: Deluxe Edition
description:
Deluxe Edition includes the following:
- The base game
- Special Clive Steelbook Case
- Cloth map of Valisthea

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III

name: Cardiac Powder
description: Cardiac Powder is a twin-stick shooter where you have a bomb in you, if you can’t maintain a certain BPM, it will explode… So one thing to do is keep you in action by fighting your opponents!

name: Colored Effects
description: Colored Effects is a puzzle platformer game where you use different abilities to advance through levels. Each color grants a unique ability. Switch between the colors and their effects to collect gems, defeat bosses, and solve fun puzzles.

name: Brown Dust II
description:
The continent of Svern, which had been under the rule of the Karian Empire a long time ago, became peaceful under the reign of five kingdoms.
However, an ominous shadow of dark magic looms, and the fate of the Five Kingdoms is slowly twisted.
Tensions rise amid the growing embers of war, and the terrifying fiend of fate heads for the peaceful Lugo village...

name: Vine
description: Vine is a story that takes place inside the lung laboratory of Poro left behind on a planet where mankind has disappeared. A puzzle game in which you use a frog's tongue to solve puzzles.

name: Casino Resort Tower
description: Casino Resort Tower is a simulation game where you build and manage a casino hotel skyscraper from the ground up. While trying to solve the problems caused by troublesome customers with a CEO that dreams about a luxury office.

name: Feed All Monsters
description: Feed All Monsters is a cute and cozy Line Puzzle game. Assist a team of delivery workers in their quest to bring tasty food to all the little monsters. Find the optimal path for each worker in order to get all the monsters fed.

name: Forever Skies
description: Forever Skies is a first-person action survival game. Return to Earth destroyed by an ecological disaster, fly a high-tech airship, expand, rebuild and repair it. Scavenge resources to survive, face the dangers of the surface as you will hunt for viral pathogens to cure a mysterious illness.

name: The Bookwalker: Thief of Tales
description: The Bookwalker is a narrative adventure where you play as Etienne Quist, a writer-turned-thief with the ability to dive into books. Use your powers to traverse reality and book worlds, and track and retrieve famous items like Thor's Hammer and the Excalibur in exchange for your creative freedom.

name: Valthirian Arc: Hero School Story 2
description: Not all heroes are born, many are forged by the finest Hero School. Take command of the faculty, nurture a unique and ever-growing roster of students, and earn your place among the most prestigious schools in the world of Valthiria.

name: Mars First Logistics
description: Mars First Logistics is a physics-based open-world simulation game, where you design, build and control your own mechanical creations to deliver important cargo between colony stations on Mars. Earn credits, unlock new technology, upgrade your vehicle and tame the hostile Martian landscape.

name: Six Days in Fallujah
description: Six Days in Fallujah is a first-person tactical military shooter that recreates true stories of Marines, Soldiers, and Iraqi civilians who fought Al Qaeda during the toughest urban battle since 1968.

name: Nova Lands
description: Nova Lands is a factory building, exploration, and island management game. Explore, engage in combat, and automate your industry. The planet you’re on is full of mysteries, creatures, people, and things to do. Welcome to your new home amongst the stars!

name: Nimbus Infinity
description: Nimbus Infinity is a high-speed aerial mech action game, set in the future of a war-torn Earth that has just begun to heal. Equip mechanical Battle Frames with weapons to customize your battle style, and soar through variant battlefields while discovering the story of a new generation.

name: Tinkertown
description: Gather your friends and come to Tinkertown, a refreshing new multiplayer sandbox experience! Explore magical places filled with loot, danger, and creativity.

name: Silicon City
description:
Silicon City is a new take on the classic city builder genre, where each citizen voice their opinion.
Will you be an urban designer, a rural evangelist or a reckless capitalist?
Build your way to the most productive city until elected as the best mayor or plan the city of your dreams in sandbox.

name: Hidden Dawn
description: A fantasy themed adventure game published by E-One Studio.

name: Final Fantasy XVI
description: Final Fantasy XVI is the first fully fledged action RPG in the mainline Final Fantasy series. Clive Rosfield is on a mission to free mankind from its fate, and must use the Eikonic powers at his disposal to overcome every obstacle his enemies lay before him.

name: Cigo
description: Sin descripción

name: Code Moo
description: Code Moo is an official game for the Chick-fil-A brand that is available on the Chick-fil-A website and mobile app for a few weeks in the Summer each year. By playing the game each week, players can help the cows vandalize Circus Burger establishments and win vouchers for real world Chick-fil-A menu items.

name: One-sided Loneliness
description: 'One-sided loneliness' is a short clicker game, where you take care of a cute alien goat boy. Made for Summer Slow Jams 2023: Idle, using creative theme 'Mutation'.

name: A Fairy Tale
description: Sin descripción

name: Forklift Extreme Simulator 2
description: Sin descripción

name: A House for Alesa
description: When Alesa was 6 years old, she had a terrifying encounter with a man called "Mr. Bob." She barely managed to escape from him and the experience has haunted her ever since...18 years later, Alesa, who became a social worker, has been sent to investigate a quite mysterious family living in a very unsettling house. What seemed like a simple task, might turn out to be the most horrifying day of her life...

name: Poly Jigsaw: Primates
description: Poly Jigsaw: Primates is a traditional style jigsaw puzzle game, with a cute monkeys.

name: Balvenie's Birthday Party
description: Balvenie's subjects are preparing a party for her birthday, you must help her getting ready for it.

name: Warframe: The Seven Crimes of Kullervo
description:
Return to Duviri and delve into a sprawling new island dungeon where the tragic Warframe, Kullervo, awaits your redemption. This strange, floating prison obfuscates both Kullervo’s crimes as well as the mysterious (yet familiar) Warden who binds him under lock and key. Explore the prison’s cells to uncover the story of Kullervo’s misdeeds and wield the power of treachery through his trademark daggers and thirst for vengeance.

As a mainline update It contains an exhaustive list of quality of live changes to the game. The main new content is the 53rd Warframe, Kullervo, and his signature weapons along with the chance to encounter his story missions on a new island in Duviri.
Other Duviri changes include Captain Vor's appearance in Undercroft challenge missions for a chance at new arcanes, Kaithe customization with armor and ephemera, 2 new side missions with Paragrimm's Tomes and Lost Belongings objectives, the return of Kaithe races and 15 new decrees.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem - Pizza Power
description: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem - Pizza Power is a promotional mobile browser game by Pizza Hut only available in America.

name: To My Forever Love
description: 2D platformer in which you cannot walk. I wish you a fruitful journey.

name: You Have 10 Seconds: 2023
description: A fast paced platformer where you’re spawned into a level and given 10 seconds to work out how to reach the exit without dying. 25 areas with unique level design mechanics to learn.

name: Rally Clash
description: Jump, drift and pass your way through challenging tracks in the only mobile game based entirely on the thrilling sport of rallycross, where car racing meets motocross! One-handed thumb-swipe steering makes playing simple, but beating others to the finish line is a more difficult task.

name: I am Dave
description: Is a 3D walking simulator/adventure, where you will go to the office, buy groceries, chat with your colleagues. Live a completely normal life until you start to notice weird stuff and signs from the universe. By the way, who is Dave?

name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus - Ultimate Edition
description: Mixx Island Remix Plus is a high-energy, action-packed shooter set in a fantastic 2D world. Gather your wits, sharpen your reflexes, and prepare for the ultimate challenge.

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days - Character Set 07: Chrono Shindou
description: Additional Card Set for Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days!

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days - Additional Card Set Vol. 4 D-SS03: Stride Deckset - Chronojet
description: Additional Card Set for Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days!

name: Envasion
description: You love shooting stuff non-stop while your whole screen keeps exploding for days? Then this game’s for you, son! Buy and upgrade an assortment of tanks and weapons to roll them into battle! Those machineguns, plasma cannons, railguns, cannons, bombs and missiles will be worth everything you spend on ’em!

name: New Lands 3: Paradise Island
description: Try being the owner of a whole island amid the south sea in new time management game. Gather tropical fruit and make refreshing ice cream. Develop your own resort. As you go farther into the new lands, your tasks will become ever more varied and difficult. Train your skills in the new time manager genre game!

name: Dead City: Street Fighter Pack
description: What could be better than a good old street fight!

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard DD: Character Set 07 - Chrono Shindou
description: Set including Fighter "Chrono Shindou" and sleeves.

name: Circuit Superstars DLC: Top Gear - The Stig Challenge
description: Top Gear: The Stig Challenge brings a new kind of experience to Circuit Superstars. Inspired by classic moments of the legendary TV show, this expansion invites you to test your skills on a whole new level and laugh a lot while you're at it!

name: Idle Champions: Mythic Ishi Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Ishi (if you don't already own them) Mythic Ishi Skin An Epic Feat for Ishi 7 Gold Ishi Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Pikmin 1+2 Bundle
description:
Revisit the first two Pikmin games on the Nintendo Switch system!

Reintroduce yourself to the plantlike Pikmin and strategic gameplay that this charming series is rooted in. From finding a way home to collecting treasure, Olimar (plus Louie in the Pikmin 2 game) must partner with a parade of Pikmin to survive the harshest of conditions. Both games support optional motion controls for more options when guiding your floral friends.

Find your way home in the original Pikmin-plucking adventure

name: Pikmin 2
description:
Meet even more Pikmin (and Louie) on a treasure-hunting expedition

Swap between Olimar and Louie to divide and conquer in Pikmin 2. Tasked with helping pay off their employer’s debt, the pint-sized pair teams up with Pikmin (including purple and white Pikmin) to collect treasure on...you guessed it...a strange planet. Time ticks away on the surface, but cave systems let you take your time to let your strategy blossom.

name: Pikmin 1
description:
Find your way home in the original Pikmin-plucking adventure

Meet Captain Olimar and a capable cast of red, blue, and yellow Pikmin on a dire mission across a larger-than-life planet. Olimar must guide his loveably-leafy companions through obstacles, in battle, and when collecting his missing ship parts. Your oxygen will only last 30 days, but the Pikmin provide a glimmer of hope that you may make it home.

name: Sevyal
description: Sevyal is a single-player horror game set in an underground hospital. Something has gone wrong and as a government official, you must visit the location, repair the electricity, survive, establish communication with the military, and escape.

name: Dead City: Sci-Fi Pack
description: Space stormtrooper on the streets of the Dead City!

name: Cube Escape
description: Hop, roll, and flip your way through the colorful mazes of Cube Escape!

name: Third World: The Bottom Dimension
description: Explore a fantastical world designed by visual artist Gabriel Massan & collaborators that draws on their experience of Brazil’s colonial legacy. This art-game is an experiment in non-linear storytelling and collaborative world-building that invites you to open your mind.

name: Colossal Cave VR
description: Acclaimed game designer Roberta Williams revives Colossal Cave as a retro, point-&-click, cave exploration puzzler. Based on the original 1970’s design by Will Crowther & Don Woods this VR update maintains its vintage charm, while revitalizing it for modern gamers.

name: Bubblegum Bandit
description: With the power of gravity manipulation and bubblegum, the Bubblegum Bandit wreaks havoc and takes revenge! Steal from evil robots and blow up their ships!

name: War and Peace
description: This is a unique online strategy where you can fully control each fighter and squad. Find the enemy's weak points, create complex tactical maneuvers on the battlefield, and enjoy exciting battles. Each battle is a real test of your tactical skills and abilities

name: Bandit Brawler
description: Robberies, mugging, stealing, picking pockets, and wreaking havoc in a beautiful medieval world - it all waits for you in Bandit Brawler. Follow orders from a magical rooster, pick fights with everyone around, and blow up a couple of patrols. You know, like back in the ol'days.

name: Super World Run: Bosses
description: Can you rescue the princess?

name: Maximum Tough Guy
description: "A peaceful village and peaceful daily life were suddenly disturbed by the slimes. These creatures, which used to be quiet, suddenly became active. It seems that an investigation is needed to figure out why this has happened."

name: Mosaic Chronicles Deluxe: Extended Edition
description: Enter a fantastic world full of magic and charm. Rebuild legendary tales with Mosaic Chronicles Deluxe: Extended Edition. A new puzzle game experience awaits.

name: The Wonderful One: After School Hero
description:
A standalone version of the free DLC for The Wonderful 101: Remastered made as a crowdfunding stretch goal.

As the latest member of the centinels, new recruit Luka delivers remarkable achievements. What challenges did he need to overcome to become the prestigious Wonder Goggles? This is a story of love, battle, and growth. Experience Luka's journey to becoming a full-fledged hero!

name: Wayward Rose
description: An indie thriller that will test your navigational skills as you find your way out of darkness and into light.

name: Broken Spectre
description: Broken Spectre is a cosmic horror narrative adventure game developed in collaboration with the makers of The Blair Witch Project. A cryptic message left by her father takes Casey back to the abandoned trails of Coldblood Mountain, a remote wilderness that has haunted her family for generations. In addition to its unique, macabre visual style, Broken Spectre takes advantage of the Meta Quest 2’s immersive hand-tracking controls to bring unparalleled realism to the game’s gruesome body horror elements.

name: Mario + Rabbids Sparks of Hope: The Last Spark Hunter
description: Mario + Rabbids Sparks of Hope’s second DLC pack will take our Heroes to a brand-new planet. Explore new environments, meet fun characters, discover secrets, and face off against new enemies.

name: Toleo
description: Run, jump, slide, and flap your way through beautiful, hand-crafted worlds.

name: Downbass Warriors: Heroes of Maydamn
description: DownBass Warriors: Heroes of MayDamn (DWHOM) is a hardcore first-person shooter with nice physics, a trouble-free, enjoyable shooting and an advanced character injury systems. A unique, one of a kind character armor customization system was also introduced in the game . So what are you waiting for?

name: Divided Skies
description: Divided Skies is a Third-Person Flight combat game where you play as an outlawed Cyborg who flies around on a Hover bike to complete several missions where you fight a private military force owned by the rich in this divided Eco futuristic Mumbai in the year 2100

name: Kingsblood
description:
Kingsblood is a tactical party-based RPG that blends autobattler mechanics, a mercenary management and dungeon crawling with a fully voiced story.

Join the fight against the Crown's injustice in this epic tactical RPG! Assemble a powerful guild, lead them through treacherous missions and dungeons, and unlock their true potential with smart combat decisions. Will you prevail?

name: Goodbye Dr. Sanchez
description: A coop horror game where two students were kidnapped by the maniacal Doctor Sanchez and they need to work together in different roles to escape from him.

name: Arena Breakout
description: Arena Breakout is a free-to-play realistic and tactical FPS on mobile. Players can enjoy Immersive Gunplay with console-quality graphics and sound on mobile. In the arena, players can customize their own gun with the ultimate Gunsmithing system, decide their gear to fight for fortune, and breakout for the win. Come and join this battle, also a great gamble!

name: Trepang2
description: Become the ultimate badass in Trepang2: A gory, action-packed FPS set in the near future. Unleash all hell on your enemies, dodge bullets and leave a trail of destruction in this hardcore and frenetic shooter.

name: Bandit Simulator
description: Bandit Simulator is a unique game connecting players with the medieval world you didn't know before. Create a bandit team and explore a totally different fight system like nowhere else :) Be Unique, Be Bandit!

name: Herc's Adventures
description: Sin descripción

name: Coded Soul: Uketsugareshi Idea
description: Sin descripción

name: Dead Island 2: Memories of Banoi Pack
description: Featuring weapons, skills and perks that celebrate the original Dead Island game, the Memories of Banoi pack is an essential addition to any Zombie Slayer's arsenal.

name: Dead Island 2: Golden Weapons Pack
description: Our slayers don't understated and neither will you with the Golden Weapons Pack. Slay in style with the beautifully decorated Abuela's Ashes Mace and Sam B's One Hit Wonder Pistol.

name: Dead Island 2: Pulp Weapons Pack
description: The Pulp Weapons Pack features two signature weapons that are sure to leave a lasting impression - the Homewrecker and the Eye Opener.

name: Danganronpa Absolute Vindication
description: Mearu, The Ultimate Journalist who goes by a pseudonym, suddenly awakes in an empty classroom amongst 14 other Ultimate Students, unsure how she got there. After some investigation, they're all met with an android known as Monorakun, who explains to them that they'll live in that school until the rest of their lives, unless they choose to murder a fellow classmate and get away with it.

name: Milfvania Ep. 2
description: A post soviet 3D milf adventure! Get acquainted with landlady's older daughter.

name: The Devil Game: Action Puzzle Game
description: Sliding action puzzle game with 100 levels

name: Super Kids Racing: Theme Park Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Cacildes Adventure
description: A coming of age Action RPG about a boy on his journey to join the king's army.

name: Mega Alien Destroyer
description:
Mega Alien Destroyer it's an action packed shoot em up, with distinct zones and huge alien bosses and machines, inspired in the classic shooters of the 80's and 90's like Alien Soldier, Contra series, Thunder Force series, Mega Turrican, Gynoug, Eliminate Down, R-Type, Salamander and others.

The world is in danger from an imminent alien invasion and you have to pilot a ship and fight to save it. Can you do it?

Mega Alien Destroyer is a challenging game but the bosses have their patterns that you will learn, if you lose your life in the first levels you will start over from the beginning but don't worry, there are checkpoints in the following areas.

name: Treasure Chasers
description: Treasure Chasers is a pirate-themed game, where you navigate through procedurally-generated islands, picking up cargo and delivering to other ports to sell. Besides the whirlpools, there are also pirates that are out to get you! Either avoid them or shoot them with your cannons to survive as long as you can.

name: Drift Mine Satellite
description:
A maintenance text adventure about a person living underground in a limestone mine and their work maintaining the local communication network that has sprung up there.

Stemming from a (real!) visit to a decommissioned limestone mine that is now used to house RVs and boats over the winter (and a subsequent phone notification, under several hundred feet of rock, that the space station was visible overhead), Drift Mine Satellite imagines what a post-apocalyptic community life might look like among sleeping vacation vehicles. It is a utopian apocalypse fantasy, a forever-camping world narrowed to linear miles of RVs parked under a mountain, the people who live in them, and the systems that interconnect them, both social and material.

The game was commissioned for Solar Protocol, a network of solar powered servers that connects from whatever server is in the most sunshine. It is programmed for the browser, with low-energy use and computational power front of mind. The entire story is told via spatialized text - no images, no libraries, just divs and textboxes and basic javascript.

name: Sel Mounta: Siege the Demon Castle
description: An RPG in which a party of 6 adventurers continue an ongoing quest to stop an invasion from a mysterious isolationist nation. Features JRPG style gameplay and a focus on story.

name: Comic Coloring Book: Complete Edition - Paint Extended
description: Sin descripción

name: Fun Chess: Deluxe Edition
description: Prepare for loads of fun with this cartoon version of the most popular board game in the world.

name: S.P.L.I.C.E.D.
description: S.P.L.I.C.E.D. is a free Metroidvania made by students from Breda University of Applied Sciences. Traverse a Biopunk Chinatown with high mobility and difficult combat encounters.

name: Fortnite: Intrepid Engines Pack
description: She's the engineer you want for all your mechanical needs. Time to fix things on the fly with the Intrepid Engines pack. Includes an Outfit, Back Bling, Pickaxe and 600 V-Bucks.

name: Kloot Arena
description: Welcome to Kloot Arena! This turn-based Online PvP Battle Arena game delivers non-stop action with fast-paced, skill and strategy-driven battles.

name: Masternoid
description:
Experience the captivating world of an arcade reborn and embrace the meditative power of coordinated voxel explosions.

Master the art of destruction, in a place where your trusted energy blaster is your only friend.

Skillfully juggle and control multiple ultrasonic balls with great finesse and precision.

name: Europa Universalis IV: History Lessons Bundle
description: Learn while you play in this package of history lectures specially designed for Europa Universalis IV. Knowledgeable authorities on the history and culture of the early modern era present short lectures on specific topics, organized by region.

name: The Last Hero of Nostalgaia: Deluxe Edition
description: Experience the full intriguing world of Nostalgaia with the Deluxe Edition which includes the base game and the newest adventure, The Rise of Evil DLC.

name: Europa Universalis IV: Japan History Lessons
description: Learn more about the history of early modern Japan in this package of lectures from Isaac Meyer, host of the popular History of Japan podcast.

name: Europa Universalis IV: China History Lessons
description: Learn more about Ming China, the early Qing dynasty and the surrounding nations in this package of lectures from Laszlo Montgomery, host of the popular History of China podcast.

name: Need for Speed: Unbound - Ford Mustang GT Legendary Custom Pack
description: Elevate your style with the Legendary Custom Ford Mustang GT (2015), and get a 10-level Speed Pass boost to unlock new cosmetic or customization items. Use it wisely, as the boost kicks in as soon as the pack is purchased.

name: Need for Speed: Unbound - Robojets Swag Pack
description: Switch lanes with the premium pack containing a one-off Legendary Custom and an incredible range of uniquely designed items.

name: War Gun: Shooting Games Online
description: Join Armed Conflict - an epic war game! This is the place where your skill and tactical skills will determine the outcome of the battle. Fight with players from all over the world, diversify your arsenal with weapons and prove your superiority on the battlefield. Are you ready for Armed Conflict?

name: The Elder Scrolls Online Collection: Necrom - Deluxe Edition
description:
Traverse the Telvanni Peninsula in Morrowind and preserve secrets ascribed to the unfathomable realms of Apocrypha. Unlock the runic power of a brand-new class - the Arcanist - and fight to uphold reality itself.

The Deluxe Collection: Necrom contains the base game, Necrom, all previous Chapters plus Deluxe in-game items. Pre-purchase to get the Spore mount instantly and more items at launch.

name: League of Angels: Pact
description: League of Angels: Pact is the latest action-idle MMORPG in the League of Angels series. Participate in fierce battles, awaken hundreds of Angels and empower them and finally, defend the Holy Land of Justice with their help!

name: A Bad Day for a Hangover
description: You awaken with the worst of hangovers in a nuclear bunker with supplies running low, the only chance of survival is to scavenge for tinned goods in the robot infested nuclear wasteland above before the town is nuked again

name: Chronautical
description: In this narrative-driven sci-fi mystery, investigate across space and time to uncover clues and unravel the secrets of a star system that has disappeared, and the man trying to find it.

name: Symphony of Souls
description: Save your beloved from the clutches of the God of the Dead! Symphony of Souls is a rhythm-based platformer about the Greek myth of Orpheus. Traverse the Underworld attempting to reach your goal to the beats of the music. Your performance also affects it, unlocking more elements the better you play!

name: Castle Crafter
description: A Craft online battle game in a voxel world with many single and online game modes like deathmatch and capture the flag.

name: Finger Football: Goal in Two
description: Take aim and shoot! Can you make the goal in just two shots in this relaxing and minimalist finger football puzzle game.

name: The Last Hero of Nostalgaia: The Rise of Evil
description: Embark on a new adventure and delve deeper into the lands of Nostalgaia. Go where nostalgia, tradition, and progress converge, awaiting your heroism to mould the landscape anew. Stand against the onslaught of mighty new adversaries and forge your legacy as a harbinger of change.

name: Fallout 76: Once in a Blue Moon
description: The Blue Moon rises over the hills of Appalachia, bringing forth new Cryptids to threaten the mercantile progress of the Blue Ridge Caravan Company. Defend their Brahmin herds and trade routes from crazed Cultists and monstrous creatures in two new Public Events and side quests, plus face enemies infected with a deadly new Daily Ops mutation for a chance to earn new rewards!

name: Gigachad Survivals
description: Kill lots of rocking enemies and survive to the end of your gym workout! Gigachad Survivals is a casual game with an emphasis on humor and memes with elements of a simplistic RPG. Here, every decision you make can cause an avalanche of consequences for the hordes of enemies you have to fight!

name: Planet Zoo: Arid Animal Pack
description: Coming in hot, it's the Planet Zoo: Arid Animal Pack! Discover the miraculous wildlife of the world's dunes, deserts and dusty plains by welcoming eight incredible new species to your zoo.

name: The Hunter: Call of the Wild - Layton Lake Cosmetic Pack
description: Decorate your weapon collection, tents, and blinds with these unique cosmetics inspired by the Layton Lake Reserve from theHunter: Call of the Wild
