name: Wind and Mist
description: Wind and Mist "is a 3D free flying fairyland, role-playing real-time combat adventure game.The film level image quality brings a visual feast of national style. Come and enjoy this quiet time of cultivating immortals!

name: Loop Kingdom
description: Loop Kingdom is a game focused on selling veteran fighters and hiring new ones.... while improving your market and keep searching for that legendary fighter that will take you to floor 200 or 400....

name: Age of Wonders 4: Dragon Dawn
description: Embrace the power of the Ancient Dragon Lords, in the Age of Wonders 4: Dragon Dawn Content Pack. From your Dragon Throne, forge empires inhabited by reptilian minions and use draconic magic to evolve your people into dragon hybrids.

name: Crash Team Rumble: Season 1
description: Launch was the first season in Crash Team Rumble, it began on the 20th of June 2023 and ended on the 11th of September 2023.

name: theHunter: Call of the Wild - Emerald Coast Australia
description: Welcome to Australia! Discover breathtaking landscapes and hunt iconic animal species such as the Saltwater Crocodile and Eastern Gray Kangaroo as you explore this magical new hunting destination down under.

name: Steel Racer
description:
Steel Racer is a 2D pixelated old school racing game, inspired by classics from the 80s and 90s era, featuring great chiptune music, arcade gameplay style and high speed cars! Are you ready to become the "Steel Racer"!?

Speed through 50 different circuits in any order across 5 different terrain zones. Win races and money to upgrade and customize your car. Choose between 3 difficulty settings and 3 levels of traction assist, making your car easier or harder to control on curves.

name: Docking Ships
description: Prepare to embark on a charming and cozy puzzle adventure in Docking Ships a delightful game that combines the charm of pirate ships with the brain-teasing challenge of navigating through a grid tile system to successfully dock your vessels.

name: Halo Infinite: Season 4 - Infection
description: Halo Infinite Season 4 brings Infection to the game, a military career rank system, improvements to spartan customization, new maps, additional forge features, a new battlepass, and more.

name: Chloe’s Requiem: Encore
description:
Chloe’s Requiem is a Japanese 2D adventure game, filled with mysteries and surprises. The young creator, in her teens, created the original game, inspired by free game titles such as The Witch’s House and Ao Oni.

From the original release in 2013, the graphics and sounds have all been completely revamped, allowing all players, new and returning, to have a fresh experience with the game.

In Chloe’s Requiem -encore-, the side story -con amore- is also included, which can be played after the player finishes the original story. Players who have played the game in the past can enjoy the updated art and graphics.

name: Robolt
description: Run fast and shoot faster as a little robot with a ton of firepower!

name: Tuttle: Star Flower Harvest
description: Tuttle: Star Flower Harvest: become a space flower farmer, fight off pests, learn new skills, and find out the secrets of the Starflowers! Your actions shape the Galaxies. Dig in now!

name: I Made Myself an AI
description: Build circuits and manage heat as you complete tasks in this surprisingly intuitive puzzle game unlike anything you've ever played before.

name: The Elder Scrolls Online Collection: Necrom
description:
Traverse the Telvanni Peninsula in Morrowind and preserve secrets ascribed to the unfathomable realms of Apocrypha. Unlock the runic power of a brand-new class - the Arcanist - and fight to uphold reality itself.

The Collection: Necrom contains the base game, Necrom and all previous Chapters. Pre-purchase to get the Spore mount instantly and more items at launch.

name: Crash Team Rumble: Deluxe Edition
description:
This Edition includes:
- Crash Team Rumble for PS4 / PS5
- Digital Proto Pack. Includes:
- 8 'Blocky' hero skins
- 'Pixelated' Shadow
- 'Get On My Level' In-Game Victory Music
- 'Blocky' Hat
- 'Blocky' Backpack
- 'Blocky' Score FX
- Unique Banner

name: P-Racing
description: P-Racing is an action-racing game for Playdate.

name: Crash Team Rumble
description: In Crash Team Rumble, players can play as Crash, Dingodile, and a host of other friends and frenemies, each of which has their own distinct power, personality, and playstyle, as they compete across wild and varied arenas in four-versus-four team-based online multiplayer action. To lead their squad to victory, players will slide, smash, bump and bash as a team to be the “fur-st” to bank the most Wumpa fruit in their drop-off zone, while simultaneously defending the opponent team’s drop zone. Featuring cross-platform play, Crash Team Rumble will feature tons of strategic gameplay elements that will be sure to turn the tide of scoring in hilarious ways.

name: Soul Survivor: Trials of the Goddess
description: A retro, choices-matter dungeon crawler JRPG with roguelike elements. Features a unique gameplay loop: Take up to 3 "free" items per area Fight 3 battles of your choosing Choose wisely! You Died? Revive and try again, taking up to 3 upgrades into your next life

name: Beyond Myths
description: Beyond Myths is a Metroidvania, where the player traverses a futuristic Chinatown split between dimensions with high mobility and difficult combat encounters.

name: Synesthesia
description: Is there an escape to the endless spiral? 『Synesthesia』 is a multi-route sci-fi mystery visual novel. Follow a group of college students with unique cognitive abilities who soon learn something is amiss at the institute sworn to help them, leading to implications larger than they ever imagined.

name: Aliens: Dark Descent
description: Drop into the gripping journey of Aliens: Dark Descent, a squad-based, single-player action game in the iconic Alien franchise. Lead your soldiers in real-time to stop a new and terrifying kind of Xenomorph outbreak on Planet Lethe.

name: Vinemon: Sauce Edition
description:
Vinemon: Sauce Edition is a Monster Catching Parody Fan Game made in RPG Maker XP Engine which is coined by the developers as "An Interactive Shitpost full of soul."

The game is set in a new Region known as 'Fanoth', which used to be a region that was once believed that no person would or should ever be able to enter.

name: Fireball Wizard
description: Fireball Wizard is a lovingly crafted retro arcade platformer. Blast your way through 4 worlds and 40+ levels to defeat the big bosses and find all the secrets. Unlock 9 playable characters and power and health potions as you go to help you face the challenges ahead.

name: Tasty Love
description: A dating-sim visual novel based on a messenger in social distance, with twisted plot.

name: Grim Tales: Echo of the Past
description: Who's puppeteering the past?

name: Consecrated
description: Sin descripción

name: Classic Marathon
description:
From the team that brought you Aleph One, the classic sci-fi FPS Marathon from Bungie on Mac revived for modern hardware by the fan community.

Alien forces have boarded the colony ship UESC Marathon in the Tau Ceti system, in orbit around humanity’s first interstellar colony. The situation is dire, and as a security officer assigned to the Marathon, your duty is to defend the ship and its crew from the alien threat.

This classic 1994 Bungie FPS had a foundational influence on the genre, and is now maintained by the fan community. Experience authentic game play using the original data files, with achievements, optional widescreen HUD support, 3D filtering/perspective, positional audio, and 60+ fps interpolation, just in case the original is too authentic.

name: Blood in Baldur's Gate
description:
Blood in Baldur's Gate is a community-driven free-to-play narrative browser game developed and published by Larian Studios. It served as a narrative teaser for Baldur's Gate III.

Set 15 years before the events of Baldur's Gate III, players are tasked with investigating a murder in the streets of Baldur's Gate. From June 19 to July 6 in 2023, the community could vote on which locations would be unlocked next. While the polls have ended, players are still able to follow in the voters' original footsteps.

name: Killing Machine: Movement
description:
You are Kador, a heavily armed nano-augmented spell casting former agent of the Corset Timarchy. You navigate a psypunk future society of shifting alliances. Starting in the continent of Mass City.

An overly ambitious action platformer more than a decade in the making!

name: Dead by Daylight: Attack on Titan - Armored Pack
description: It's your last chance to get these 5 Attack on Titan Outfits for The Oni, Dwight, Yui, Jake, and Meg before they leave the store on July 18th. The Armored Pack only includes the Outfits, and Dead by Daylight characters must be purchased separately.

name: Dead by Daylight: Attack on Titan - Warhammer Pack
description: It's your last chance to get these 5 Attack on Titan Outfits for The Spirit, Felix, Kate, Zarina, and Ace before they leave the store on July 18th. The War Hammer Pack only includes the Outfits, and Dead by Daylight characters must be purchased separately.

name: Fear Assessment+
description:
“Fear Assessment+” is here to give you the fear of you watching “Lost Episode Creepypastas” again, or the feeling of going through cardiac arrest.

I officially announce “Fear Assessment+” an alternate version of the fear assessment, with extended content, including: 3+ levels, an narrator, settings, longer levels, better and unique experience, and the scare-factor goes from 5 all the way to 10.

name: She Wants to Suck My Blood?
description: Step into the shoes of a daring hero and embark on a thrilling adventure set in 19th-century Europe. Your mission is to defeat the tyrannical vampire queen, Camila, but when you're unexpectedly caught and forced to serve her, everything changes. With the help of Nadia, Camila's loyal butler, and Trinity, her vampire-in-training maid, you'll uncover secrets that will alter the course of your journey. Brace yourself as danger lurks around every corner, and you realize that the lines between good and evil are not always clear-cut.

name: My Crimes
description: Get rid of the crimes. Grab all the evidence. Probably get arrested anyway because you have dogshit lawyers. Don't stop punching the boxes, it's your only way out.

name: Angel Legion: Oriental - Purple
description: Embark on your adventure with player from all over the world! Lead your Angel team to reveal the ancient mysteries of Galaxy…… Welcome to Angel legion, a free RPG gacha game with good fun!

name: Army of Tentacles: (Not) A Cthulhu Dating Sim 2 - DLC 2
description: A free DLC that adds some extra EXP.

name: Furries & Scalies & Bears OH MY! 2: Return to Kale Bay - Beyond the Monster Sea
description: Interact with two new characters and dive deeper into the mysteries of Kale Bay!

name: Trainz 2022 DLC: Pro Train DB Class 52
description: The Deutsche Reichsbahn's Class 52 is a German steam locomotive built in large numbers during the Second World War. It was the most produced type of the so-called Kriegslokomotiven or Kriegsloks (war locomotives). This pack features the DB Class 52 steam loco & tube tender, and a detailed cab view!

name: Trainz 2019 DLC: Pro Train DB Class 52
description: The Deutsche Reichsbahn's Class 52 is a German steam locomotive built in large numbers during the Second World War. It was the most produced type of the so-called Kriegslokomotiven or Kriegsloks (war locomotives). This pack features the DB Class 52 steam loco & tube tender, and a detailed cab view!

name: Trainz Plus DLC: Pro Train DB Class 52
description: The Deutsche Reichsbahn's Class 52 is a German steam locomotive built in large numbers during the Second World War. It was the most produced type of the so-called Kriegslokomotiven or Kriegsloks (war locomotives). This pack features the DB Class 52 steam loco & tube tender, and a detailed cab view!

name: Cannon Target
description: Cannon Target - A simple puzzle game, the only goal of the player is to choose the firing direction of the cannon and hit the target.

name: Garestia
description: Garestia is an online multiplayer battle Game with Sexual Content and Nudity.

name: Cambrian Dawn: Biceratopsidae DLC
description: Welcome 11 brand new species from the Family Biceratopsidae into your game!

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Wicked Warfare
description: 3 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Wild Western themed tables with a 50's and 60's style pinball inspiration.

name: Shards of Her
description: Embark in a world of magic, where once mighty gods reigned supreme, but now are hunted and on the brink of oblivion. Can you save your love amidst a world consumed by lust and betrayal?

name: Escape Academy: Escape From the Past
description:
Visit the Escape Academy of yesteryear in Escape from the Past. This prequel puts players in control of Sandra Solange and Eel Barnes all the way back when they began their journey as students at the Academy!

After a harrowing "accident" at an Academy sporting event nearly results in the death of Headmaster Horatio Windsor, he becomes certain that one of his faculty members is trying to MURDER HIM! Convinced that the murderer has eyes everywhere, he enlists Sandra and Eel as his undercover agents to investigate each of the suspected teachers.

As the "accidents" keep piling up, players must successfully navigate (and survive!) five, all new rooms while piecing together clues to deduce the would-be killer’s identity. It's an Escape Academy whodunnit!

name: Pixel Knight
description: Pixel Knight, a platformer hack n slash in a pixel art style, you progress into various levels and beat enemies to upgrade your gear and your character. You can customize your character by choosing spells through equipments and combine their effects to become more and more powerful.

name: Loading Simulator
description: A game for the most patient! Loading has never been so exciting! If you love loading screen and puzzles, this is what you're looking for!

name: Fashion Holiday: A Game of Texas Hold 'Em
description: Unleash your poker skills in "Fashion Holiday: A Game of Texas Hold 'Em," where a mall-bound evening sets the stage for playful matches against intriguing characters. With 32 stunning outfit choices, immerse yourself in light-hearted dialogue and stylish 4K art.

name: Maze Tanks
description: Control the tank to search the maze for your enemies. Obstacles block the field of view, which you can use to hide, or destroy to create a better view and direction of fire. While firing a cannon can also give away your position, it can also be used properly as bait to attract a target.

name: Beat the Machine: Rebooted - Invasion
description: T.O.M is back and his Invasion of Sector IV has begun. With a new arsenal of enemies, T.O.M is ready to take over a different part of the Origin Sectors. In this pack experience 15 new levels, a new survival map, new enemy types and more.

name: Farm Keeper
description: A tile-based farming game where success means maximizing yields, conquering rent, and expanding your farm through random tile choices.

name: Backrooms Society
description: Backrooms Society is a 1-8 player co-op horror game. Make your way through unique levels of the backrooms while trying to survive and avoid mysterious entities. Scavenge each level for gear and resources, bring it back to The Hub where you can sell valuables and buy/craft new gear.

name: Trouble Juice
description: Trouble Juice is a Side Scrolling Shooter Roguelike set in a TV show tournament that is broadcasted across the universe. Use your character's special abilities, and unlock prizes in the Achievement Bingo. Become the ultimate champion and earn your place in the galaxy's hall of fame!

name: My Real Desire
description: Its a visual novel +18, hosted in itch.io and most popular, this game ia finish and the MC is cold and calculist but he Discover a love on your on harem and protect all girls , because he a mafia member but not care anymore, he loves new family and Discover dark secrets of your creation

name: Mario Bros G&W for ZX Spectrum
description:
A homebrew remake of Mario Bros. Game and Watch from 1983, compiled on ZX Boriel.

2nd Place in Planeta Sinclair GAME OF THE YEAR (BASIC Category 2024)

name: Ciying
description: A Chinese idiom guessing game that combines pictograms with Wordle guessing

name: Plat Wacky Adventure Remastered
description: Play as Plat Wacky as he tries to save the world!

name: Sex Simulator: Locker Room
description: An interactive sex simulation game featuring visual novel elements, high definition graphics and videos, and realistic-looking characters set in a beautiful decor. You play the role of a guy who has to share the locker room with other hot women.

name: Missing Memories
description:
Traverse through the memories as Naomi, a girl who refuses to leave her house due to some unfortunate events regarding a relative.

The game was made for the Dream Diary Jam 7.

name: Love & Dehumanization
description: This is an adult visual novel that takes place in a fantasy RPG world. A girl willingly becomes a monster and is subject to brutal violence. Though she doesn't realize it, hope is somehow waiting on the other side of this cruelty.

name: Party Party Time: Excitement Pack
description: Guaranteed to raise the roof! Enjoy 10 new minigames! Introducing Excitement, a new downloadable content pack for Party Party Time! Enjoy 10 brand-new minigames! Join your friends and raise the roof!

name: Deep Blue Fantasy
description: Deep Blue Fantasy is a roguelike adventure game set in an underwater world. Collect weapons, recruit crew, hold the lucky dice in your hand, and embark on a journey into the unpredictable depths of the sea!

name: PowerSimulator
description: Do you want to be a upright official or corrupt officials？Choose your choice,Reaching the pinnacle of power.

name: When Night Comes
description: When Night Comes is an immersive and spine-chilling horror game. If you're a fan of survival horror games and want to test your skills against a terrifying demonic force, then this game is definitely for you. Are you brave enough to face the Entity? Play When Night Comes and find out!

name: Miwa: The Sacred Fox
description: Dive into Japanese-Hawaiian story, where light is the last hope to survive. Play as Shima Nobu and fox Miwa and save the village from darkness. Miwa: The Sacred Fox is an 2D adventure platformer game with many interesting puzzle elements and a beautiful hand-drawn mystical world.

name: The Awaited ReCollection
description: A story about fatherly love and family affection. A gift for those children who have lost a father in their lives.

name: Puzzling Wild IQ Test
description: Puzzling Wild introduces this IQ Test of logic and visual reasoning. These IQ Tests were developed by a Professor to try to test the intelligence of AI robots. Can you solve all 400 by your self? The puzzles are introduced by our good friends Ginger the Giraffe, and Hugo Hippo.

name: High Noon In Akhetaten
description: A Quake map largely based off of Serious Sam's Karnak level.

name: Precipice Pain
description: A Doom-style map that revolves around a big vaguely hellish rock formation, on which Duke has to "climb" (jump, fall off ledges, etc.) up and down a lot.

name: Rags to Liches
description: A small, third-person, action, tower defense game where you play as a peasant who gets tired of adventurers breaking into his house. Place down towers and fight off waves and waves of "enemies." Progress through the story and see just how far one man will go to protect his beloved llama.

name: Box Clicker
description: Are you ready to defeat all opponents? You can enhance your combat skills and increase your power with just a single tap, while obtaining new outfits to become a real boxer. Your speed is your most powerful weapon! Each opponent presents a different challenge and strategy, so you must time your attacks well and execute powerful combos. The faster you are, the more damage you can inflict! Download now and take your first step towards becoming a real fighter!

name: Sou Desu, Anata no Koibito Desu.
description: A psychological horror visual novel game about a stalker.

name: Scorn
description: This wad features 10 short, compact levels with mostly a vanilla aesthetic. Gameplay is standard Doom 2 fare. Not too hard but it can be deadly.

name: Super Lava Bros.
description: Super Lava Bros. is a rom hack for Super Mario Bros. which removes the floor and replaces it with lava.

name: Mystical Mixing: Arcane Edition
description:
Enter a world of magic and wonder with Mystical Mixing.
Pour the potion into the cauldron, throw in the clover, bone and feather, stir and voila - you have a cute Mixie!

Combine other ingredients to create Mixies with different features: winged, horned, spotted, furry... the possibilities are endless.

name: Piece of..Horror
description: An indie horror game about a hypermarket security guard.

name: Burger Zombies
description: A top down free roaming shooter where you play as a burger delivery man who is completing his orders during the zombie apocalypse. Pick up and deliver orders while shooting and driving against a ever growing horde of zombies.

name: MazeMaze
description: "MAZEMAZE" is an adventure game where you explore maps, find objects, and progress through the story. One day, the protagonist jumps off a building and finds themselves in a mysterious space. They are guided through corridors in a maze where various things exist.

name: Vroom Vroom Valley
description: Hit the race track and improve your racing skills or take a sunday drive in a beautiful scenery. Vroom Vroom Valley offers a safe driving experience for the rookies but can also challenge the most seasoned veterans.

name: Bucket Brawl: Ahlman Edition
description: A fast-paced arena fighter where animal toys seek to recycle each other in a world of plastic and raining buckets. Throw buckets on the heads of other players, push them off a ledge and be the last toy standing.

name: Slippery Sammy
description: Slippery Sammy is an arcade game where you help Sammy to walk as further as possible in a snowy afternoon, trying not to slip so much on the freezing sidewalk.

name: LabyrInk
description: LabyrInk is the result of a 5-day Game Jam. It's an exciting third person shooter where the environment starts out completely invisible. You and other Goblinks must paint it up in order to reveal a path to your opponents. Features two distinct game modes: Last One Standing and Deathmatch.

name: Detective Agency Gray Tie 2: Collector's Edition
description: AviGames presents the second game from the Detective Agency "Gray Tie" series. In this hidden objecft game you have to investigate the theft of a famous painting and solve loads of mindchallenging mini games and riddles!

name: Winterland
description: This is a short peaceful RPG. Your only commands are "joke", "dance", "stare", "run away", and "hug".

name: Night Security
description: Night Security is a Japanese psychological horror game about night security.

name: Korean Political Fighters: 2ND
description: Korean Political Figures: 2ND is a fighting game featuring a Korean politician who inherited a mobile game of the same name. Choose the politician you support and be reborn as the strongest.

name: Doomer
description: Try on the role of a Russian Doomer, who lives in a typical post-Soviet building. Your pointless life filled with routine and addictions. Can you cope with it?

name: Plants vs. SiIvaGunner
description: Plants vs SiIvaGunner is a browser game developed by Sierpinski Simon. The game is a version of the games Plants vs Zombies based around running jokes from the YouTube channel SiIvaGunner. The game was made as a fan contribution to The SiIvaGunner 7th Anniversary Art Gallery.

name: Doll Repair
description:
Experience the joy of doll repair and ASMR doll makeover in this relaxing doll dress up game!

Welcome to Doll Repair, the ultimate satisfying games! With ASMR diy paper doll sounds and stunning graphics, this is the perfect ASMR doll makeover for anyone who loves satisfying games or doll dress up game.

Immerse yourself in a world of paper doll dress up and customization. Choose from a variety of different story scenes in makeup games , each featuring a unique worn-out doll that needs your help. Use your creativity and imagination to bring the dolls to life once more in satisfying games!

name: Anime Princess: Cosplay ASMR
description:
Have you ever dreamt of cosplaying as an anime magic princess? Anime Princess: Cosplay ASMR will make your dreams come true!
Anime Princess: Cosplay ASMR is a cosplaying fashionable simulation game with cute anime girl style, suitable for all age girls to play.

In Anime Princess: Cosplay ASMR, you can cosplay and dress your own anime doll image. Step into the anime girl dress-up cosplaying room, collect exquisite fashion items to fill your wardrobe, and customize the princess styles you like. Not only can you enjoy the fun of DIY your styles, but also Anime Princess: Cosplay ASMR has lots of character outfits, like royal-themed outfits, school-themed outfits, and so on.

name: Blank Relish
description: A struggle for survival and finding purpose amidst the isolation of an unknown planet.

name: Oshi no Ko Quiz
description: A fanmade quiz game based on the manga and anime Oshi no Ko. In the game you're asked questions about characters and story.

name: World of Solaria: MMORPG 2D
description:
Embark on a thrilling 2D pixel art MMORPG adventure. Immerse yourself in a vast fantasy world filled with epic quests, intense battles, and endless exploration.
Very simple and easy to handle!

name: Re:Mobilize
description:
Re:Mobilize is a brand-new single-player Quake modification by EmeraldTiger and Inky that introduces three new movement-based mechanics to the game, opening up devious new challenges to players and a whole new dimension of possibilities for level designers.
Trampolines: Perform death-defying leaps of faith across even the most intimidating gaps and chasms.
Wiremeshes: Nothing can stop you, not even gravity itself. More than just simple ladders, these surfaces let you move up, down, sideways, and even hang from ceilings.
Lighthooks and Lightpanels: The lighthook's purely photonic composition allows it to instantly latch onto any visible lightpanel, regardless of distance. You'll be hooked in no time - literally.

name: List 118
description:
When Tsunagu was about to pass through the school building—
Yoru, who was supposed to be holding his hand, suddenly disappeared, and the entrance was blocked.

name: Kowloon's Rhizome: A Day of the Fire - Vol. 2
description: Kowloon's Rhizome: A Day of the Fire is an Adventure game.

name: The Horror Within
description: A short indie horror game with puzzle elements where you're playing a horror game inside the game.

name: Power to Play: The Game
description:
Collect lightning bolts, fight enemies along the way, and the album art to power up. Defeat the final boss. Do you have the power to play?

A browser game promoting British pop punk band "McFly". An homage to the original Super Mario Bros. and other retro titles.

name: Closed Circuit
description: A port of Closed Circuit for Playdate

name: Amaze! Time Attack Edition
description:
Lets pop & move the ball and paint - you’ve got to color and paint your way across the AMAZE maze puzzles.

Watch out! AMAZE gets harder as you play, color and paint the maze, and fill in puzzles!

Painting the maze puzzles sounds easy, but you have to be super strategic to color and fill every square.

name: S Lanes
description:
S Lanes is a fast-paced one-button game.

You are constantly moving between the four lanes on the left side of the screen. Your goal is to shoot enemies that are coming from the right to keep them from reaching the lanes. Hold a button to shoot and to move forward towards the enemies. Collect the coins that enemies drop after you destroy them to score points.

The game is over when any enemy reaches any of the lanes.

name: Donuts in Space
description: Donuts in Space is an arcade shooter where the player destroys donut meteors and alien ships. Survive and collect powerups as you blast your way through a tasty galactic assault.

name: Crime Files Bundle
description:
This bundle includes:

Ghost Files: The Face of Guilt - Lead a police investigation in the afterlife!

Ghost Files: Memory of a Crime - Stop a series of terrible crimes!

Crime Secrets: Crimson Lily - Stop the mysterious killer!

name: Park Beyond: Visioneer Edition
description:
In Park Beyond, you can create the park of your dreams without being held back by gravity. The user-friendly controls and a story-driven campaign mode will help you learn the ropes of park management and build increasingly crazy rides and modular coasters.

The Visioneer Edition includes the full game, the Park Beyond: Annual Pass, as well as its Coaster Car Bonus, and Zombeyond Impossification Set.

name: Speed or Death
description:
Cross a city infested with enormous monsters, dodge the fiery breath of a dragon, find how to escape an alien invasion... all without getting eaten by a worm.
This is Speed or Death, a frenzied racing game where the most important thing isn’t reaching the finish line, but surviving the chaos around you. Unlock the different cars and live to tell the tale another day. What apocalypse shall we race through today?

name: Senpai Arena
description: Welcome to the arena! Create your character and go battle against zombies for a place of honor on the Steam leaderboard!

name: Amicade
description: Three classic Score Attack games with online Leaderboards. Blast, Chomp and Swerve your way to high scores!

name: Nevultra
description: Nevultra is an exciting shoot'em up that will take you back to the 8bit/16bit era. The protagonist, Nina, needs your help to reach her destination in deep space.

name: Dobuki's Epic Journey
description: Embark on Dobuki's whimsical quest across three vibrant planets. Solve clever puzzles, battle quirky enemies, and save the galaxy from the clutches of Emperor Lik Wang in this charming blend of point-and-click adventure and RPG elements.

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R - Alternate World Diego
description: Wryyy! Stop your enemies in time with the ultimate stand, The World, wielded by Diego Brando! Take your game to a whole other universe with Diego's new found abilities! Available now!

name: Fear of Neighbours
description: Fear of Neighbours is a psychological horror game that puts you in the shoes of a resident in a quiet Finnish neighbourhood.

name: Ziggy
description: Ziggy is a challenging platformer about a small lightning bolt trying to get back home. Your main objective is to go through all the traps and reach the end. Can you do it?

name: 49 Squares
description: Simplistic, relaxing puzzle game. Click boxes to create patterns. Make patterns to complete 100 achievements.

name: Mystery Trackers: Fatal Lesson Collector's Edition
description: It's no ordinary town... Can you stop a mad mayor and his destructive robots?

name: Find with Seoul: Story Puzzle
description: Follow the story of clones set in post-cyberpunk dystopian Seoul while solving 3-match puzzles. Experience the change in the low-grade clone Charashi who couldn't even afford a piece of bread.

name: Gate of Souls
description: I got a job as a night guard. They promise to pay a lot, but for my own safety I have to follow strange rules. As you progress, you'll have to find keys and open locked rooms. A first-person game with elements of horror. Explore the hospital and its rooms, collect batteries for your flashlight.

name: Cyber Hunters
description: Try your skills and have fun with our amazing bundle of two action games.

name: Tits and Shadows
description: Tits and Shadows is a captivating turn-based RPG that seamlessly blends thrilling battles, intricate puzzles, and tantalizing adult content. Immerse yourself in a world teeming with diverse enemies, intriguing NPCs, and engaging quests.

name: Super Mega Baseball 4: Peril Point Stadium
description: Go yard in more stadiums across game modes with Super Mega Baseball 4 Peril Point. Stay tuned for more details coming soon!

name: Sweet Bakery Tycoon: Co-op Edition
description:
Sweeten up your life!
Start your baking career and prepare some delicious cakes for your clients, using a whole set of creams, fruits, and decorations.

Test your skills on 60 diverse and increasingly difficult levels.

Personalize your interior with countless upgrades.

name: Hexceed: Terra Pack
description: This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Terra Puzzle your way through 137 new levels - levels include all previously introduced mechanics!

name: Grapplania
description: Join Lynn, a descendant of a long line of whip-wielding warriors, in a 2D adventure through a perilous, abandoned castle filled with treasure.

name: Cow Girls 3 Stories
description: Only the greenest meadows, only the cleanest ponds, and only the most fragrant flowers on our farm! Any girl cow will feel great here! This means that they will be gentle and give lots of milk!

name: The Hermit Chronicles
description: The Hermit Chronicles is a 1st-person survival horror game set in a deep forest. Assuming the role of a hermit, you will have to get food, scout your neighborhood, and search for resources to make gear. But after the sun goes down, you'll have to survive for real...

name: Cave of Past Sorrows
description: Rush straight into the action. Embrace the fast-paced bullet hell, hidden within the Cave of Past Sorrows. Watch your past, present, and future collide in a surreal spectacle.

name: Majoneko
description: A hard puzzle platformer of predicting trajectories and climbimg a giant castle!

name: Anyu
description: A 3D third person narrative exploration game, set in a frozen wasteland where an ancient civilization fell. Centered around movement puzzles and dealing with environment mechanics.

name: Moose Lost in the Woods
description: Moose Lost in the Woods is a cozy 3D platformer without a language barrier. Explore by running, leaping, bouncing, and splashing around in Swedish forest environments, whilst stuffing your backpack with goodies!

name: Popologist: Camera Slinger
description: You are on assignment of a newspaper company. “The POPOLOGIST”, on a mission to capture photo images of events, people & objects throughout the city within your cameras battery life & memory allotted. Overshoot & you cant complete all assignments. Will Your Pics make Front Page News?

name: Settris
description: "Settris" is a block-placement puzzle game in which players place pieces in the empty squares on the puzzle board, and fill all empty squares to clear the board.

name: Sparky Marky: Episode 2
description: It's your first day at Amber's Park - strange recreational camp for children. Complete employee training and meet Sparky - a friendly mascot at day, Kinder Surprise with a monster inside at night. Solve puzzles to deactivate Sparky and save your life.

name: Stardust Defenders
description: Stardust Defenders is a tower defense, roguelike, bullet hell, where you will face hordes of enemy creatures with the power of forest spirits, leveling up and choosing upgrades that will allow you to survive.

name: 69 Balls
description: A Third-Person shooting game but you are not a person. You are a BALL! Imagine a pool ball, a shotgun and football mechanics mashed together! You said you can't? Neither do I! Just shoot everything you see and pray if the black ball goes in!

name: The Stranded Traveler
description: Embark on an epic journey in The Stranded Traveler, a 2D side-scrolling action-adventure game where you take on the role of a traveler stranded on a mysterious island. Explore dangerous environments, fight fierce enemies, and defeat challenging bosses!

name: Cube Control
description: Help a lone cube navigate through sixty electrifying levels in this isometric puzzle-adventure game. Carefully manage the use of your limited moves in order to complete each level successfully, all while avoiding dangerous obstacles through careful timing and creative movement choices.

name: The Ultimate Death Clock
description: You find yourself in a singularity with Death itself. With few chances to speak with the living, Death proposes a little game. Do you dive deep within yourself to indulge this cosmic guide and find out when you will meet again on official business? The Ultimate Death Clock awaits!

name: Hoppy Hop
description: Join Hoppy in this classic action platformer as you collect candies, dodge enemies and jump. After all, you are a rabbit!

name: Sex with Maids
description: Sex with Maids - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: A Lost Note
description: Follow the journey of a curious cat as it explores a range of different environments that were once the backdrop for a moving and emotional love story.

name: Stack Island
description: After waking on a seemingly deserted Island, you’ll need to piece together the clues to survive and remember what happened. Exploring the island will unlock new recipes and cards, which can be used to craft tools to explore new areas.

name: F1 23
description: The award-winning F1 series is the official videogame of the FIA Formula One World Championship, putting players in the driving seat of the greatest racing spectacle on Earth.

name: Gemstone Guardians
description: Gemstone Guardians is a tower defense game where selection and combinations are key. Similar to a game of poker, players are given a set of random towers each round and must make the best combinations to prevent the waves of enemies from reaching the end.

name: Hidden Cats in New York
description: Meow meow! Kittens are hidden in New York, let's find them all. A short and pleasant experience! Start with a Beautiful monochromatic illustration, relax and find all the cats one by one to reveal the final colored art. Play through different modes, find special cats, and unlock bonus levels!

name: Plushie Bomber
description: Blow your enemies up with their own bombs in this explosive 2D action platformer! Catch the deadly plushies' bombs in time to throw them right back to the sender! Will you uncover the cute fluffy toys' origins?

name: Lost Abroad Café
description: Lost Abroad Café: a language learning game that puts you in the role of a virtual café owner in another country. Learn and use your new language to serve your customers and grow your business. Try it now on Steam Early Access!

name: Night in the Unpleasant House
description:
A twisted tale of loss, revenge, local politics, and pseudoscience (among other things), Night in the Unpleasant House is a branching work of interactive fiction.
It's been ten years since your father vanished while investigating strange happenings surrounding his boss—The Mayor.
Now you follow in your father's footsteps. Can you find out what happened to him and uncover the Mayor's dark secrets?
After working your way into the Mayor’s good graces, you’ve at last discovered the location of his oft whispered-of house—a place where his enemies vanish, only to return gibbering, mindless lumps… if they return at all.
Search the house, uncover the clues, and make decisions that will ultimately determine how—and if—you survive the night.
During your night exploring the house, you'll try to uncover the secrets the Mayor has striven to bury and find out what happened to your father. Or maybe you won't! Other paths lay before you, and with thirteen different endings the choices you make will determine your ultimate fate.

name: Deducto 2
description: A fun sus-like game where you backstab your co-workers and get mad at your co-workers for backstabbing you. (up to 10 players)

name: Corbid! A Colorful Adventure
description: Have fun helping Corbid to overcome the mazes to be crowned champion. Eat, mix and shoot colors to solve the puzzles of Corbid! A Colorful Adventure, a cute 3D platformer for all audiences.

name: The Infinite Black 2
description: The Infinite Black 2 casts the player in the roll of a Captain managing a fleet of ships to hunt aliens, trade resources, loot treasures, and craft equipment. Join player-run corporations with friends to build shipyards, discover (and use) strange alien technology, and vie for territorial control. Test your mettle in a PvP Arena against other Captains, or declare yourself an Outcast Corporation, waging a never-ending intergalactic war against all who oppose you!

name: Pandemic 1993
description: Survival horror set in Japan! Fight off various creatures, search for your missing wife and child, and escape from the town safely!

name: We are Eva
description: Play the game in multiple dimensions at the same time, traveling between them whenever you like! Doesn't it sound fun? My name is Eva, by the way, I'm the main protagonist of the game you're looking at, and I promise we'll have fun. If you add me to your wishlist, of course. *wink wink*

name: Park Beyond
description: In Park Beyond players can create the park of their dreams, without being held back by gravity! As the newly-hired visionary architect for a struggling company, players will be able to create mind-twisting theme parks. Players can create rides they have always dreamt about but that couldn’t exist in real life. Along with Phil, the enthusiastic park veteran and Izzy, the stern but friendly executive and a host of other colorful and passionate characters, players will pave the way to a successful and profitable park company. Thanks to accessible controls and a story-driven campaign mode, players will get to learn the ropes of park management and build increasingly crazy rides and modular coasters.

name: Tails of Trainspot
description: "Tails of Trainspot"is a unique and enjoyable puzzle game that takes you on a journey to a mysterious island filled with stories. As a railway builder, you'll lay tracks, connect stations, and uncover secrets and myths on the Packan Islands.

name: Aimlabs
description:
Aimlabs is a training platform designed by gamers to help sharpen up your core FPS aiming skills. Aimlabs offers a comprehensive set of tools to improve your aim, regardless of which FPS you play. It provides curated aim training scenarios that will turn you into an aim God in no time.

Dive into specifically designed aim training exercises to master the art of flicking, tracking, speed, perception, and cognition. What sets Aimlabs apart is its ability to provide detailed aim analysis feedback, giving you valuable insights and guiding you towards rapid improvement.

Aimlabs is continuously updated with new features to ensure compatibility with a wide range of games. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned pro, Aimlabs is an invaluable tool for gaining a competitive edge.

name: Bunny Love Expert
description:
Reisen has been having troubles with love lately... but she's far from the only one. Basically every bunny in all of Eientei is asking for her help to get with the rabbit of their dreams, leaving with little time to handle her own issues.

Solve everyone's problems (somehow) by solving 28 bunny-based puzzles, picking stuff up or using items and devices to direct the bunnies to where they want to go!

name: DownhillVR
description: DownhillVR is the ultimate virtual reality mountain biking video game that brings the thrill of extreme downhill racing right to your living room. Experience the rush of speeding down challenging tracks and catching air off jaw-dropping jumps, all while immersing yourself in stunning environments.

name: Stack Bounce
description: Time your taps to smash through a tower of colorful blocks.

name: Reverse 1999: The Theft of the Rimet Cup
description:
Version 1.1 of Reverse: 1999, which includes:
• New characters: Melania, Pickles, and Diggers
• New Garments for Regulus, Centurion, and APPLe
• New main event: The Theft of the Rimet Cup
• …and more!

name: Halo Chaotic Edition
description: In this mod, all enemies and allies will multiply once they die, turning small fights into a real battlefield not to mention the amount of explosions that there will be!

name: Happy Game/Pilgrims
description:
Physical bundle exclusive to Super Rare Games.

Contents:
Game cartridge containing Happy Game and Pilgrims
Reversible cover
Full-color manual
2 stickers
2 sets of 3 random trading cards for each game

name: The House of the Dead: Remake - Z Version
description: Sin descripción

name: Barbie Color Creations
description: Join “Brooklyn” and “Malibu” on a colorful adventure in painting, sketching, designing and more! Explore an ever expanding bedroom of coloring books, tools, designs, locations and items. Bring Barbie’s memories to life with creative design challenges. Embark on a creative journey by customizing items and characters from your favorite Barbie movies and series, then save your designs as stickers and play with them in 2D locations. Earn unique rewards for completing design stories, and use them to decorate your personal studio. Download any drawing as an image to your device, so you can show it off to your friends and family.

name: Kart Life
description: Download now and start your quest for karting glory!

name: Jake Everest 2: Gunung Padang The Unseen Civilization
description: Embark on another epic journey with adventurer and archaeologist Jake Everest! His latest endeavor leads him to a mysterious object inscribed with ancient runes! He boards a plane to investigate the connection when he recognizes matching runes at the Gunung Padang archaeological site. His efforts alongside the archaeological team will lead them to discover lost secrets beyond anything they ever imagined! Come along for a match-3 journey for all time!

name: Mystery Box: The Journey
description: Welcome to the 4th chapter of the popular 'Mystery Box' puzzle game series! 10 new boxes full of enigmas to crack are waiting for you on this journey through lost worlds.

name: Fortnite: True Colors Pack
description:
This pack includes:

- Vivi Chroma Outfit
- Scribbles Back Bling

name: Fear Assessment
description: The Fear Assessment program is a specialized test developed and implemented by government agencies to collect data on psychological torture techniques and their impact on individuals. It serves as an essential tool in understanding the effects of fear-based manipulation. This test uses your webcam.

name: Layers of Fear: Deluxe Edition
description:
- The Layers of Fear (game)
- Original Soundtrack (digital)
- The Art of Layers of Fear

name: Power The Light
description:
Light, we need it to see and to live, the lights have all gone out and it is now up to you to bring them back.

Can you power the lights?

name: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - Myth of the Moors
description: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter and 3 Legendary Weapons: The Moorhound (Hunter), Maw of Darkness (Romero 77), Hell's Dewclaw (Caldwell Pax), Snarling Dawn (Flare Pistol).

name: Wolf Simulator
description:
Wolf Simulator is an amazing game with spectacular hunts and alpha battles. Become a wild wolf, fight for new territories so that the wild world would know who is a real Alpha.

The main action of the game lays around realistic hunting of a variety of animals and beating the Alphas on each territory of the vast open world map. But be careful! Some animals might be very attentive, so you have to silently crawl to catch them.
You may also grow your pups which will help you hunt down big and fierce animals, like bears and even tigers! On the other hand, you simply can explore numerous stunning locations with your fellas, once they are grown ups.

name: Minecraft: The Incredibles
description: Step into the boots of the Incredibles and dive mask first into a Supers playground! Suit up and play together as Mr. & Mrs. Incredible, Frozone, Violet & Dash to save Municiberg with their incredible powers. Explore the city, bring down the Omnidroid, battle The Underminer and stop Screenslaver's hypnotic schemes. Defeat them all to make Supers legal again!

name: Bounty Drag Racing: Outlaw Pack 1
description: This Outlaw Pack includes (2) Outlaw type vehicles, with big tires and wheelie bars, and (2) Radial 275 versions of these vehicles with no Wheelie bars.

name: Yume Memory
description: A relaxing Match Two Minigame featuring Anime Characters from the Works of Yume Creations.

name: Knight Overloaded
description: Night Overloaded is a roguelight survival game that reinforced strategic choices. Beat enemies falling from the sky endlessly, and expand your inventory!

name: Four Lights
description: "Four Light" by Visual Novel, urban fantasy RomanceA world where humans use superpowers all over the world.The stage is a story that takes place in the fictional city of Gaon City in modern times (about 2020).

name: Xargon Remake Ep.3
description: A remake of the classic 1993 DOS video game Xargon.

name: OMSI 2: Add-On Coachbus 303-Series
description: The Coachbus 303-Series add-on for OMSI 2 is a high-quality expansion that provides a realistic simulation of the iconic O303-Series bus from various countries.

name: Star Conflict: Edges of Risk - Stage one: Deluxe edition
description: This pack includesAccess to additional rewards in the event “Edges of risk. Stage one”.Upon receipt, the following 15 levels are immediately unlocked and all rewards of the unlocked levels are available30 days of premium license.

name: Train Simulator: Western Maryland H-9 Class
description: Return to the glorious age of steam railroading in the Allegheny Mountains with Machine Rail's extraordinary Western Maryland H-9 class 2-8-0 built by The Baldwin Locomotive Works!

name: Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy: Chapter 1 - Take Control
description: Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy: Chapter 1 - Take Control is the first chapter of Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy.

name: Tex'em
description: A Texas hold'em poker game for Playdate. The wildest game in the wilderness!

name: Ordinary Rooms
description:
You are Joey, a very curious person who likes to explore the abandoned places. This time, you read the newspaper about the abandoned facility and decided to go there to explore.

Game inspired from Roblox Rooms.

Menu music by chromestones

name: Arcade Archives: Megablast
description: Feast on a four-way firing frenzy!!

name: Gramik Paint Roller
description: Can you win this challenge?

name: Teardown: Creative Mode
description: Teardown, the fully destructible sandbox heist game is adding a creative mode, so not only can you knock stuff down you can now build things up. Create models and objects in-game and save them to use in future sessions by "painting" with voxels.

name: QUByte Classics: Beat 'Em Up Archives
description: Unleash Your Inner Fighter in Beat 'Em Up Archives: Iron Commando and Legend. Experience Classic Brawling Action in Two Timeless Games from the 90s!

name: Horse Club Adventures: Complete Collection
description: Horse Club Adventures: Complete Collection is the ultimate entry into the world of the Horse Club Adventures and provides you with all games released in the series so far.

name: Horse Club Adventures 2: Gold Edition
description: Horse Club Adventures 2: Gold Edition includes the game Horse Club Adventures 2 Hazelwood Stories incl. the additional content "Secrets of Skeifa".

name: Horse Club Adventures 2: Secrets of Skeifa
description: A ferry has docked at Hazelwood’s harbor that brings you and the girls from Horse Club to a new island! Sail across the sea and discover a long-kept secret!

name: Night Terrors
description: Experience a chilling adventure unlike any other! Join Kenny on a journey to conquer his night terrors and discover the ultimate solution. Kenny's parents, desperate for a remedy, have sought the help of a renowned doctor who offers an experimental drug to banish these haunting nightmares for good.

name: Market Warfare
description: Lead the Fruit Army and defend your base from the evil vegetables in this Tower Defense game.-Create your strategy with a variety of characters.-Adapt to different scenarios-Manage your money to keep your defense line full of fruits.

name: Murder at Mystic High
description: Cute visual novel murder mystery game

name: Snoody: One of the Ayrie
description: Bring back color to the wonderful planet Ayries! Together with Snoody and his friend Picke go on an exciting adventure to other planets. Explore distant worlds, study elemental magic, collect crystals and defeat monsters! Save the people of ayrie and find out, who is responsible for their troubles.

name: Heavy Metal Titans
description: Heavy Metal Titans is a modern-retro Run n' Gun Shoot ‘em up that takes players on a blood-soaked time traveling quest to defeat General Glen Planamento and retrieve the stolen time crystal, a powerful relic that can manipulate time and reality.

name: Combat Mission: Red Thunder - Battle Pack 1
description: Combat Mission Red Thunder Battle Pack 1 is set in or around the time frame of the Soviet assaults through the late summer of '44 in eastern Poland. The Battle Pack includes two new campaigns and 13 standalone scenarios and 13 new Master Maps.

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Season 4 - Critical Corruption
description: Welcome to Season 4 - Critical Corruption! Though we have gained great ground against the rampaging Lithophage in the past months, it remains a constant threat- and to make matters worse, reports of alarming new mutations are starting to come in. Let's get right into it!

name: Their Majesties' Pleasure
description: Pursue love and glory with unruly royals, seductive Fae, and rogue assassins in this epic text-based RPG romance set in a kingdom on the brink of war. As a member of the royal guard, it is your duty to protect the heirs to the throne, but the rebellious siblings lead you on a merry chase outside the palace. They open you up to a world that you never knew before: a secret network of assassins, corrupt city officials, and a cabaret brimming with songs, spirits, and sex. And when you are done carousing in the city, you can move into the dark of the magic-filled forest, where demigods and Fae throw jubilant, bacchanal revels, which include orgies for those so inclined

name: PsychWorld
description: Export a vast procedurally generated world where you never know what you'll see next. Explore and loot a variety of structures such as the catacombs and turret towers. Slaughter enemies, grow your defenses, and escape the prison that is your mind. Just make sure you're not followed...

name: Bus Simulator 23
description: Drive your daily bus route and reconnect with an old friend
